author: {'steamid': '76561198966421310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 98717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63667, 'last_played': 1710389560}
review: Big Bang Empire is a humorous adult themed game that has solo and PVP missions to complete for various levels of awards. Each mission has varying times of completion! Various neighborhoods are where missions are found. You are the head of an adult film production studio and your character is the STAR of your studio. Your Star advances by gaining varying basic skills to compete in "fights" against other stars for fame. Some of the items worn by your star boost basic skills. Overall, it's an interesting almost idle game that I've always returned to over the years!

author: {'steamid': '76561199015073645', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1708613778}
review: am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198416760533', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 433, 'playtime_forever': 1649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1305, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1712351902}
review:
Review:
Hey there, fellow gamers! Buckle up and prepare for an adventure like no other! Big Bang Empire has absolutely blown my mind with its unique blend of RPG, strategy, and... ahem seductive elements. 😏


Let me tell you, this game is not for the faint of heart. From the moment you step into its vibrant and daring world, you'll be greeted by a cast of characters that are as entertaining as they are alluring. The developers have really nailed the art of creating captivating personalities that draw you deeper into the story. It's like being part of a sizzling reality show!


The customization options in Big Bang Empire are simply mind-boggling. Want to create a sexy and confident character? Go ahead! The game gives you the freedom to design your very own superstar, and believe me, the possibilities are endless. 💃🕺


Now, let's talk about the gameplay. It's addictively fun! As you progress through the game, you'll find yourself managing your superstar's career, battling fierce opponents, and even engaging in some steamy interactions. The strategic elements keep you on your toes, and the progression system is satisfyingly rewarding. 🌟


However, I must mention that the game's energy system can be a bit restrictive. Sometimes, you'll find yourself itching to dive deeper into the action, only to be halted by the need for more energy. But fear not! The game offers various ways to replenish it, so a little patience goes a long way. 😇


Overall, Big Bang Empire is a wild and alluring ride that offers a refreshing twist to the RPG genre. It's not just about the provocative elements; it's about the gripping storyline, the engaging characters, and the thrill of building your own superstar empire. So, if you're ready to embrace your sexy side and embark on an unforgettable adventure, this game is definitely worth a try! 🔥💫


👍 Pros:



Captivating characters and storyline

Extensive customization options

Addictively fun gameplay


👎 Cons:



Energy system can feel restrictive at times


So, what are you waiting for? Step into the world of Big Bang Empire and let the seductive journey begin! 😉✨

author: {'steamid': '76561198415376930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 428979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 4840, 'playtime_at_review': 382884, 'last_played': 1712486065}
review:
Hey, Playata...this game is nice and all, but did you forget it exists? I see no updates of any kind being made for this game. Will you fuse servers for this game like you do for Shakes & Fidget? I am asking because i am playing on GR4 server and the server is literally dead. I know that i can play on a more alive server, but i started and put a lot of work on this server, i don't want to change servers and lose all the progress.

And one more thing. Can you please bring back 2 of your old games called SoccerStar and Bloodmoon?
SoccerStar had to do with European football,but it actually worked similarly to Shakes & Fidget.
Bloodmoon had to do with Vampires and Werewolves and archers (archers were supposed to be a reference to Vanhallen if i am not mistaken), but it was similar to Shakes & Fidget.

Let's see if i will get any kind of an answer, although i suppose not,because this game Big Bang Empire is completely and utterly dead. It's a miracle that servers are still up...i imagine the servers are full of dust and spiders. Hey guys, how many years do you have to go down there in the basement to check up/on these servers?

author: {'steamid': '76561198031641554', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1687466447}
review:
SURGICAL EXPERIMENTS ON SLAVES

The father of modern gynecology, J. Marion Sims, gained much of his fame by doing experimental surgeries (sometimes several per person) on slave women, according to The Atlantic. Sims remains a controversial figure to this day, because the condition he was treating in the women, vesico-vaginal fistula, caused terrible suffering. Women with fistulas, a tear between the vagina and bladder, were incontinent and were often rejected by society.

Sims performed the surgeries without anesthesia, in part because anesthesia had only recently been discovered, and in part because Sims believed the operations were "not painful enough to justify the trouble," as he said in alecture according to NPR.

Arguments still rage as to whether Sims' patients would have consented to the surgeries had they been entirely free to choose. Nonetheless, wrote University of Alabama social work professor Durrenda Ojanuga in the Journal of Medical Ethics in 1993, Sims "manipulated the social institution of slavery to perform human experimentations, which by any standard is unacceptable." In 2018, a statue of Sims was removed in response to the ongoing controversy, according to The Guardian.

author: {'steamid': '76561198390082030', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 107527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8761, 'last_played': 1690228237}
review:
Arkadaşlar oyunu +18 sahneler için oynuyorsanız tavsiye etmem çünkü yok gibi bir şey.. Sadece resimler var. +18 animasyonlar yok. Ama oyunun senaryosu mükemmel okuyup eğlenebilirsiniz. Karakter gelişimini senaryoda çok iyi işlediklerini düşünüyorum.. Onun haricinde oynayacaklara:

1-)Oyunda 4 temel yetenek var Güç, Dayanıklılık, Karizma ve Ustalık.. Kazanılan yetenek puanlarınızı eşit olarak dağıtın. Dövüşe gireceğiniz ekipmanlarınızda Gücünüzü düşük tutun.. Görevlerde başarılı olma şansınız daha çok artacaktır.. 
2-) Enerjinizi sonuna kadar harcadıktan sonra 4 kere 50 enerji alabiliyorsunuz günlük 300 enerji harcayarak çok rahat gelişebilirsiniz..
3-)  Oyunda film çekiyoruz.. Filmler ilerlemek için çok önemli hem deneyim puanı hem de hayran kazanabilirsiniz.. katıldığınız stüdyoda kupa olarak +1 film çekmene yarayan kupalar olabilir. Mesela ben şuan günde 6 film çekiyorum..
4-)Düello sisteminde temel 100 enerjimiz var her saldırı başına 20 enerji istiyor.. 20 enerji altındaysanız her bir enerji 30 saniyede geliyor fakat 20 ve üzerinde 3 dakikada 1 enerji kazanıyorsunuz bunu değerlendirebilirsiniz..
5-)Oyuna para yatırmayı düşünmüyorsanız elmaslarınızı harcamayın ve biriktirin.. +200 levelden sonra kazanılan parti eşyalarına arıtma yapın.. Böylece karakterinizi ileri seviyeler için güçlü hâle getirebilirsiniz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006784111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 211, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1505953298}
review:
Big Bang Empire is an online browser game that allows players to create and manage their own adult film studio. The game features a cast of characters that players can interact with, as well as a wide range of customization options for both their characters and their studios.

The gameplay primarily involves completing quests and missions, which often involve creating and filming adult films. The game also features a number of mini-games and activities that players can participate in to earn rewards and advance their careers.

As an online game, Big Bang Empire also features social elements such as chat rooms and forums where players can interact with one another. The game is free to play, but does offer in-game purchases for premium items and currency.

While the game's adult themes may not be suitable for all players, it does offer a unique and somewhat humorous take on the management sim genre. The game's graphics and animations are cartoonish and exaggerated, adding to the game's comedic tone.

Overall, Big Bang Empire is a decent game for those interested in adult-themed management sims. However, its reliance on adult themes may turn off some players, and the game's repetitive gameplay may not hold the attention of more serious gamers for long.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988541754', 'num_games_owned': 792, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6201, 'last_played': 1682629413}
review:
For english translation scroll down!
Man was hätte das Spiel für Potenzial haben können, im Stile der alten Lula und Leisure Suit Larry Reihe als Online RPG-Spiel. Der Witz ist ja ansatzweise da, aber was will der Spieler auch von einem Handy-Port erwarten. Die Grafiken erinnern, wirklich an die Zeichnungen von den Erotikspielen der 90er Spiele, was ein gewissen Charme hat. Der Spieler schließt angebliche Aufgaben ab, worauf hin ein Zeitbalken eingeblendet wird und hinterer schnöde Animationen bzw. Standbilder kommen, es gaukelt eine Art Rollenspiel vor, wo man erotische Kleidung und Accessoires ausrüsten kann, die einem noch fähiger im Duell machen sollen. Leider wiederholt sich alles bis zum Erbrechen, was schnell in Langeweile ausartet, und ohne Geld kannst du vergessen an die Spitze der Rangliste zu kommen, weil man dafür ein voll ausgestattetes Studio haben muss oder aber die lange Zeit zu überbrücken, was Echtgeld, also umgetauschte Diamanten kostet. Motivation ist in dem Spiel nicht vorhanden, wenn ich Standbilder sehen will, spiele ich lieber Point & Click Adventures, die haben wenigsten eine spannendere Geschichte. Auch dass man während der Mission, wenn man diese zusieht, nicht chatten kann, ist ja wohl der größte Witz, um wenigstens die Zeit zu überbrücken. Naja, wie sagte einmal ein Geschäftsmann auf einer Gamingkonferenz? "Let's go whaling", das trifft eher zu als "Let's talk about Sex" von Salt ’n’ Pepa, also fast alles was so ein schönes Pay2Win Spiel so auf sich hält, um den schmutzigen Ruf in der Gamingbranche zu verteidigen. Dass das Spiel geschnitten ist und eine ungeschnittene Version, leider nur in Englisch von Nutaku gab, brauch ich nicht extra erwähnen, weil Steam da restriktiver geworden ist, gerade was den deutschen Markt anbetrifft. Auch das das Spiel in verschieden Browsern und bei Steam ab und zu abstürzt, erkennt man bei dem Publisher und Entwickler deren Prioritäten, die sagen sich wie Marylin Monroe "Diamonds are girls best friend". Lasst eure Schmuddelfinger von dem Spiel und spielt lieber die alten Larry oder Lula Teile, die allemal besser sind als wie diese schlaffe Nudel oder geht zu Frau Doktor, ins Wartezimmer, da habt ihr mehr Cosplay und Rollenspiel als wie bei dieser Zeitverschwendung und ihr könnt euch sogar nackig machen und in echt chatten. Leider bist du hier der dressierte Affe, mein Freund, wo sich die Gamingbranche scheinbar alles erlauben kann, wie weit man gehen kann, aber Diablo Immortal zeigt ja bereits, dass man keine moralischen Grenzen mehr kennt und die Spieler sehr leidensfähig, in Bezug auf Gaming, wie bei einem Domina-Besuch sind. Man hälts vor Schmerzen kaum aus, aber man ist so süchtig, dass man es immer wieder macht. In diesem Sinne frohes Abzocken. Mal sehen, wann mich die Langeweile wieder packt und ich das Spiel wieder hervorkrame, weil ich dann wieder der perversen Sünde aus der Hölle verfallen bin, dann möge mir Anita Sarkeesian mit der Peitsche den Teufel austreiben.

What potential the game could have had, in the style of the old Lula and Leisure Suit Larry series, as an online RPG game. The joke is there to some extent, but what does the player expect from a mobile phone port. The graphics are really reminiscent of the drawings from the 90's adult games, which has a certain charm. The player completes alleged tasks, whereupon a time bar is displayed and behind it there are boring animations or still images, it pretends a kind of role-playing game where you can equip erotic clothing and accessories that are supposed to make you even more capable in a duel. Unfortunately, everything is repeated ad nauseam, which quickly turns into boredom, and without money you can forget about getting to the top of the rankings, because for this you need to have a fully equipped studio or to bridge a long time, which is real money, that is, exchanged diamonds costs. There is no motivation in the game, if I want to see still images, I prefer to play point & click adventures, at least they have a more exciting story. Also the fact that you can't chat during the mission when you're watching it is probably the biggest joke, at least to bridge the time. Well, as a businessman once said at a gaming conference? "Let's go whaling", that's more true than "Let's talk about Sex" by Salt 'n' Pepa, i.e. almost everything that such a nice Pay2Win game is worth to defend the dirty reputation in the gaming industry. I don't need to mention that the game has been cut and that there was an uncut version, unfortunately only in English by Nutaku, because Steam has become more restrictive, especially with regard to the German market. The fact that the game crashes in different browsers and on Steam from time to time shows the publisher and developer's priorities, like Marylin Monroe they say "Diamonds are girls' best friend". Leave your dirty fingers off the game and rather play the old Larry or Lula parts, which are always better than that saggy noodle, or go to the doctor's in the waiting room, there you have more cosplay and roleplay than with this waste of time and you can even get naked and chat in real. Unfortunately, you're the trained monkey here, my friend, where the gaming industry seems to be free to go as far as you can, but Diablo Immortal is already showing that there are no more moral boundaries and the players are very capable of suffering when it comes to gaming , as in a dominatrix visit. You can barely stand the pain, but you're so addicted you do it over and over again. In this sense, happy rip-off. Let's see when I get bored again and dig out the game again because I'll fall back into that perverse sin from hell, then may Anita Sarkeesian whip the devil out of me.

Мир полон приключений, только не в вашем маленьком родном городке Йеллвилл. Очевидно, что карьера в эротическом шоу-бизнесе - лучший выход оттуда. Так что подписывайтесь на невероятно смешные миссии и покоряйте голубой киноолимп! "Империя большого взрыва" бросает юмористический взгляд на одно из любимых занятий человечества и бизнес, который его окружает. Создайте свою индивидуальную звезду взрослого кино, совершенствуйте свои навыки, собирайте сексуальные вещи, объединяйтесь с другими звездами в студии и покажите всем остальным, кто здесь главный!

review:
Das Spiel macht Spaß, ist aber auch super geeignet um es im Hintergrund laufen zu lassen. Ich spiele meist nebenbei Sims 3 und schaue Youtube. Hab es aber auch teilweise bei Home Office arbeiten nebenbei noch laufen. Meine Mitspieler sind super freundlich und ich habe mir mittlerweile ein tolles Studio erstellt. 
Es ist kein "Pay to Win" Spiel, aber es ist durchaus möglich Echtgeld im Spiel einzusetzen.

author: {'steamid': '76561199070027704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 53378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2345, 'last_played': 1699501498}
review:
Who doesn't want to make their own porn-star?! Probably the most fun I've had in months. Its more of a side game than anything I play it aside 'All" my other lewd games. its sort of like one of those really interactive Facebook games' they even have their own chat to meet players in-game, a marriage system, studio's for your friends and such to go to war with other Studio's, the missions are small time arrogance of spending energy and waiting; thus why i say its more so a Facebook game, but all in the same its one of my favorites. Trust me when i say, you'll find plenty of action in Big Bang Empire. only nudity I've seen so far is only what is behind some gem paywalls that you can easily work around with the gem's they have given you, and can earn plenty in-game. The biggest thing I enjoy most about this game is how well tied together everything is to keep you revolving in a cycle to maintain a consistent worth of time spent on playing it, Looking forward to the Long and foreseeable future of this game! I've met great and funny friends, this is a place where you can be your raunchy self! Animations need work though...hope to see you all In-Game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003102974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 125159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64622, 'last_played': 1699675441}
review:
It's one of those "idle" games, where you click on something and then wait a certain amount of time for the points. It's more playable than many of those though, because there are a lot of features to keep a person busy, and you can always pick a new mission instead of running out of "energy" like most games have. So, there's never a point when you can't do anything and just have to turn it off. For that, it's been a good game to leave on in the background and click on every now and again. For people who like idle games, collecting, trying to level up over time, and studio battles, I'd recommend.

It's assumed that anyone who says they are getting horny off this game is joking.  It's cartoony and goofball. Definitely not a good game for people who are seeking porn or j.o. material!

author: {'steamid': '76561198309045552', 'num_games_owned': 37, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 851, 'last_played': 1489439457}
review:
Pograłem ponad 14h w tą grę i wydaje mi się, że mogę ją obiektywnie ocenić.
Na pochwałę zasługuje oprawa graficzna która nie może się nie podobać.
Prosty, nawet trochę kiczowaty styl rysunkowy fajnie pokreśla tematykę gry.
Nie jest przy tym wulgarny. Tak jakby na do oglądania i tak już różowego porno-świata
ktoś jeszcze nam podał różowe okulary. Od strony dżwiękowej nie da powiedzieć się nic poza
tym - dźwięki są. Osobiście wyciszyłem je prawie do minimum bo ah-y i oh-y postaci z czasem
zaczeły męczyć. Rozgrywka jest banalna i przypomina przeglądarkowe gry takie jak np. Bitefight.
Prosty system oparty na 4 statystykach które zawsze będą dla nas za niskie.
Zresztą najlepiej sprawdzić samemu. Pozycja nie wymaga wiele czasu żeby powiedzieć "dość"
lub "jeszcze chwilka".
Osobiście traktuje ją jako dodatek. Poprostu jest sobie okno włączone gdzieś w tle
gdzie zajrzę w przerwie miedzy rozgrywami w ambitniejszych grach.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122984053', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 20233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20228, 'last_played': 1669672792}
review:
Ograne setki godzin na wersji przeglądarkowej i teraz kolejne setki na steamie, ta ilość chyba mówi sama za siebie. Gra jest bardzo humorystyczna, treści erotyczne są przedstawione w po prostu zabawy i żartobliwy sposób!
Co jest również plusem to fakt, iż gra nie jest nastawiona na wyzysk użytkownika, będąc człowiekiem free2play można super rozwinąć postać i naprawdę dobrze się bawić!
Kolejną kwestią jest społeczność w grze. Może to moje szczęście, ale przez tyle czasu spędzonego w grze nie spotkałam nikogo kto by był niemiły czy toksyczny. Wszyscy są bardzo uprzejmi i starają się pomagać sobie nawzajem!
Jeśli ktoś szuka luźnej gierki do po prostu poklikania sobie to osobiście bardzo polecam ^^

Ogólna ocena: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198088853055', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 152389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1241, 'playtime_at_review': 118868, 'last_played': 1712390135}
review:
Я в игре с 2 октября 2017 года, Наиграно 1,981 часов. Печально что закрывают российские сервера. Буду скучать по игре. 
"Уважаемые Игроки,
Это ваше последнее уведомление о закрытии  серверов. Завтра, 07.12.2021, все российские серверы Big Bang Empire прекратят работу и будут навсегда закрыты.
Как объяснялось ранее, мы глубоко опечалены закрытием наших серверов, но причины закрытия находятся вне нашего контроля.
Мы хотим поблагодарить вас за то, что вы сыграли с нами в нашу игру. Мы надеемся, что Телльвиль значит для вас так же много, как и для нас."



I have been in the game since October 2, 2017, Played 1,981 hours. It is sad that the Russian servers are being shut down. I will miss the game.
"Dear Players,
This is your last server shutdown notification. Tomorrow, 12/07/2021, all Russian Big Bang Empire servers will stop working and will be permanently closed.
As explained earlier, we are deeply saddened by the closure of our servers, but the reasons for the closure are beyond our control.
We want to thank you for playing our game with us. We hope Tellville means as much to you as it does to us. "

author: {'steamid': '76561198228767628', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 7488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1640133586}
review:
Assim como Hero Zero, esse é um jogo 8 ou 80, ou seja, tu pode amar ele ou odiar, dificilmente vai ficar no meio termo. 
Esse jogo é um daqueles jogos de facebook que todo mundo jogava há 10 anos atrás pra passar o tempo, ele cumpre muito bem a proposta, você pode fazer muitos amigos e a evolução do seu personagem acaba se tornando algo viciante.

Pra quem já estava acostumado com o Hero Zero, não vai ter muitas surpresas nesse jogo, as builds fortes continuam as mesmas, até mesmo os challenges são muito parecidos.
A primeira vez que joguei esse jogo foi no seu lançamento em 2014 e estou feliz por ele e o Hero Zero terem sido lançados aqui na steam em 2016, esses dois jogos marcaram minha vida.

Pontos positivos: 
1 - missões engraçadas.
2 - interação social opcional.
3 - o tempo vai passar sem você notar.
4 - progressão viciante, depois de algumas horas tu não vai querer parar de jogar.

Pontos negativos:
1 - pay to win, quem paga tem muitas vantagens.
2 - servidor antigo, no momento já existe player no nível 995 que está jogando desde 2014, então se tu pretende ser o top 1 do ranking geral e vai começar agora, creio que seja impossível.

review: This game is for those who have nothing better to do than watch the clock and wait. The idea of the game is that you are an up-and-coming adult film star, and you need to complete missions to earn money. However, unlike an idle game that plays itself while you are away, you start the mission, and you sit and wait until the time runs out, which is anywhere between 1-10 minutes. Steam has twice deactivated my account due to inactivity. This is frustrating, as my previous avatar/account had been over a level of 100, and the deactivation caused me to have to start again from scratch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307618671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 1515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1626162542}
review:
Just another bottom of the barrel shovelware porn game ported from Android.
The game's okay, as far as garbage mobile ports go, at least.

Could definitely use vanity slots for your equipment, though. I can tell right now that I'm totally going to have my character looking like a total clown in a few levels, just for the stat bonuses.

EDIT: yeah, there's a vanity system at level 25.

EDIT2: I've played it some more now, the game is surprisingly solid...ish. Very simple, and clearly designed to mooch money from whales, but it's fine F2P regardless.
My number one complaint about this game is that it's really not that sexy; sure there's bits and bobs and other jiggly bits, but there's no sex, hardly any animations, and the game is just so vanilla that it can get a little boring.

EDIT3: there's definitely a memory leak or something, the game crashes if you leave it open for an hour or two.
The game is still alright overall, but I'm not so sure about all these reforging bonuses people can get, like reflecting damage, hitting twice, bonus evasion chances and such, I've found people with too much money/time can farm for those bonuses and become 10x more powerful. It makes PVP a little iffy, but it's not too bad so far.

EDIT4: Kinda got a bit of a weird opinion about the game now; I played the Nutaku version and it's most certainly quite a lot more lewd, the Steam (and by extension, the Facebook version) are absolutely gutted to the bare minimum, which is absolutely bonkers since Steam allows literal porn now.
THAT SAID, *this* version of the game is still playable, it's just an exceedingly simple "idle" game with a million wait timers. I wouldn't say it's bad, it's just empty.
My opinion: go play this on Nutaku instead.
...and no, you can't port your account to the site, I've double-checked with the devs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198989971381', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 12447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10150, 'last_played': 1635880891}
review:
Big Bang Empire

Kocham gry przeglądarkowe, od zawsze coś mnie do nich ciągnęło... Chęć uzyskania TOP1 na serwerze, bycia najlepszym.
Niestety jak to każda gra przeglądarkowa ma do siebie jest ona typowy Pay2Win systemem, bez diamentów owszem da się wykonywać misje, zdobyć różne przedmioty ale z diamentami robimy to szybciej i jesteśmy wstanie zdobyć 2x więcej przedmiotów, najprostszym takim przykładem jest kasyno które od czasu do czasu występuje w grze. Pierwsza lepsza złotówa jest wstanie wycisnąć mega dużo pozytywnych rzeczy z tego a to wszystko za diamenty.

Gra jest oparta na RNG (Random number generator) pomimo % jakie uzyskujemy przy ulepszaniu postaci czasami wydaje mi się że całkowicie nie mają one znaczenia. Możesz mieć 50% na unik przy przeciwniku który posiada 1% ale to on i tak odda pierwszy 5 uników.

Typowa gra pod farta.
Nie masz zamiaru wydawać pieniędzy? Nie polecam marnować nerwów na tą grę, zdecydowanie odradzam.
Aczkolwiek jeżeli chciałbyś pograć to z chęcią zapraszamy Cię na serwer PL6 do studia Revenge Team.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048054765', 'num_games_owned': 3029, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 627, 'last_played': 1675106740}
review:
Porn star idle RPG. You know how these idle games work, pick a task and then wait X minutes for the timer to reach zero, but with an adult twist. You start as a low budget star and work your way up to a mogul in the industry. However there are a few things that you need to know before you start though.

First off if you intend on playing this game as it was meant to be played in all it's glorious nudity then go play the Nutaku version instead. To no one's surprise the Steam version is the censored version of the game. You're only getting half the experience on Steam.

Since this game was originally a web browser game it still runs in it's original resolution with no way to change it. Playing this on a hi-res monitor shrinks everything to a fraction of the screen.

And lastly but most importantly...

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2420565849

Don't get too attached to your character because they delete inactive accounts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140307902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 44490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41997, 'last_played': 1644086149}
review:
[h1]Introducción[/h1]

Recomiendo el juego solamente porque lo que vi de positivo es la comunidad que me encontré, me mantengo en el juego no solo por eso, si no, porque aspiro a ser uno de los mejores en el servidor español.

[h1]Reseña[/h1]

❥Del vamos es el típico juego Pay 2 Win, pero no del todo como la gente cree. El juego no te priva de forma gratuita los diamantes en ningún momento y las formas en las que puedes utilizarlos son bastante lucrativas al final, si bien se pueden omitir las misiones pagando tambien puedes usar los diamantes gratuitos en vez de pagar por ellos.

❥En el apartado de "gameplay" no es la gran cosa, iniciar una misión y esperar a que termine, puedes hacer películas XXX que básicamente es esperar a que se llene la energia de película y hacer las misiones para llenarla al 100%. Los duelos es otra parte importante del juego, ya que subes la fama y consigues alguno que otro billete o prenda para mejorar al personaje.

❥Una parte fundamental del juego son los estudios(clanes, facciones o como gustes llamarlos) los cuales tienen un templo semanal que se basa en completar ciertas cosas para que tu estudio logre estar primero( y son muy buenos premios inclusive en el tercer o cuarto puesto de la clasificación). El estar en un estudio también le da ventajas a tu personaje, como bonus de mayor % de billetes conseguidos o experiencia, así también como un bonus de aumento de habilidades, todo esto depende de que tan mejorado esté el estudio.

❥La comunidad es muy agradable en parte, de momento no me encontré con muchas personas que sean odiosas o pervertidas, lamentablemente hay una parte que sí es pervertida y en mi caso, solo lo experimente con una persona, el infame "empotrador". Así que es un punto a favor pero a medias, ya que lamentablemente es posible que te encuentres con el lado asqueroso de esta.

❥En cuanto a personalización no es muy amplia, vas a poder personalizar la cara pero no más que eso, si bien el juego presenta un sistema de prendas que cada una te da diferentes puntos de habilidad para tu PJ, no vas a poder personalizar a gusto y a su vez aumentar tus habilidad, lamentablemente vas a tener que elegir entre una u otra, puedes solucionarlo pagando diamantes para cambiar el aspecto de una prenda, pero como es de esperar, vas a encontrar otra mejor y tendrás que tirar la prenda que cambiaste y junto a ella, tus diamantes.

❥El apartado visual no es la gran cosa, no posee muy buena calidad pero su estilo es agradable, es un toque caricaturesco con una parte bizarra que no logre a ser erótico al 100%, de hecho, el juego censura bastante, lo máximo que verás son pechos desnudos, fuera de eso, censura pura de una forma cómica.

❥Del sonido no hay mucho que decir, es simple sonido ambiente que entra en loop, un loop que es bastante fácil de reconocer ya que no se molestan en disimularlo de ninguna manera, también puedes elegir que cambiar el sonido de tu personaje al dar y recibir golpes, puedes usar el default o el "pornoso" el cual solo son gemidos más relajados.

[h1]Opinión[/h1]

En mi opinión, lo recomiendo, pero solo como un pasatiempo cuando no tengas que jugar, porque como ya dije, es un juego P2W como cualquier otro, de hecho, es perfectamente comparable con un juego de móvil que no inmova en absolutamente nada.

[h1]English version[/h1]

[h1]Introduction[/h1]

I recommend the game only because what I saw as positive is the community that I found myself, I stay in the game not only because of that, but because I aspire to be one of the best in the Spanish server.

[h1]Review[/h1]

❥It is the typical Pay 2 Win game, but not quite as people think. The game does not deprive you of diamonds for free at any time and the ways in which you can use them are quite lucrative in the end, although you can skip the missions by paying you can also use the free diamonds instead of paying for them.

❥In the "gameplay" section it is not a big deal, start a mission and wait for it to finish, you can make XXX movies which basically is to wait for the movie energy to be filled and do the missions to fill it 100%. Duels are another important part of the game, as you raise fame and get the odd ticket or garment to improve the character.

❥A fundamental part of the game is the studies (clans, factions or whatever you like to call them) which have a weekly temple that is based on completing certain things so that your study manages to be first (and they are very good prizes even in the third or fourth ranking position). Being in a study also gives your character advantages, such as a bonus of a higher% of tickets obtained or experience, as well as a bonus for increasing skills, all this depends on how improved the study is.

❥The community is very pleasant in part, at the moment I did not meet many people who are hateful or perverted, unfortunately there is a part that is perverted and in my case, I only experienced it with one person, the infamous "embedder". So it is a point in favor but half, since unfortunately it is possible that you find the disgusting side of this.

❥As for customization, it is not very broad, you will be able to customize the face but not more than that, although the game presents a system of garments that each one gives you different skill points for your PC, you will not be able to customize taste and in turn increase your skills, unfortunately you will have to choose between one or the other, you can solve it by paying diamonds to change the appearance of a garment, but as expected, you will find a better one and you will have to throw away the garment that you changed and next to her, your diamonds.

❥The visual section is not a great thing, it does not have very good quality but its style is pleasant, it is a cartoonish touch with a bizarre part that does not manage to be 100% erotic, in fact, the game censors a lot, the most that you will see they are bare breasts, outside of that, pure censorship in a comical way.

❥There is not much to say about the sound, it is simple ambient sound that goes into a loop, a loop that is quite easy to recognize since they do not bother to hide it in any way, you can also choose to change the sound of your character when giving and get hit, you can use the default or the "pornoso" which are just more relaxed moans.

[h1]Opinion[/h1]

In my opinion, I recommend it, but only as a hobby when you don't have to play, because as I already said, it is a P2W game like any other, in fact, it is perfectly comparable with a mobile game that does not immove anything at all.

review:
Это моя любимая игра с 2015 года, и я всегда буду защищаться.
Он плохо говорил = он играл неправильно, он снова играет.
Ему удается скоротать время, и это очень затягивает, я уже приобрел много друзей и очень рекомендую его!
Если вы заболеете и перестанете играть, можете быть уверены, что когда-нибудь снова вернетесь.
Я узнал, что недавно он был у меня в Steam, и мне кажется, что здесь гораздо лучше играть, чем через браузер.
Невероятно <3

review: Pretty addictive game and I enjoy that in some games. It's kind of an idle type of mobile game with adult themes so if you think you'd enjoy that then give this a try. You can get attacked by other players but I dont think you lose money or anything like that if it's a defeat so it's passive in that regard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198990670474', 'num_games_owned': 190, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1959, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1711, 'last_played': 1601263206}
review:
Jogo RPG online de aventura e estratégia muito bonito, recheado de cenas e referências NSFWs, que consegue entreter por muitas horas. A jogabilidade é simples e a gatosona do tutorial explica tudo certinho (em português). A trilha sonora não é lá essas coisas e os efeitos sonoros enjoam rápido. Não temos Conquistas e nem Cartas Steam, mas quando você considera que é um game grátis, tá de boa.

O grande detalhe é que o game é um Pay2Win e, como em qualquer jogo deste tipo, após muitas horas de diversão e níveis uppados, o jogador verá sua evolução "travar" até que ele invista com dinheiro real. Ainda assim, é legal de jogar e ver sua estrela pornô crescer. Então, esteja preparado para uma enxurrada de atividades com limites de energias diárias. Vale um 6/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084846680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2936, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2936, 'last_played': 1595221017}
review:
Да, много красивой графики, интересная игрушка. Вам дают что обычную игровую валюту, что премиум валюту - брюлики.
Вот только разрабы забыли сообщить, что часть плюшек (что покупается за реал), вы не можете купить за игровые брюлики и вы обязательно должны купить брюлики за реал.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087341054', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 83396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2119, 'last_played': 1614266264}
review:
Ce jeu n'est pas le jeux de l'année mais il est marrant.
Il faut le laisser de coté pendant qu'on fait autre chose c'est sur (le mode pleine ecran n'est pas disponible, peut etre pour cela).
Pendant que je fais d'autres choses, je reviens toutes les 5 minutes sur le jeu pour lancer une mission.
Il faut bien attendre 48h avant d'avoir debloqué des elements permettant d'avoir des revenus dans le jeu (certain niveau, site de streaming...)
Mais une fois la machine lancée c'est sympa et marrant, pas obligé de payer pour jouer (sauf si vous etes impatient)

Un jeu "facebook" qui permet de s'amuser sans plus

author: {'steamid': '76561198306732878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 105584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7570, 'last_played': 1670344532}
review:
Esse é meu jogo favorito desde 2015 e eu vou defender sempre.
Falou mal = jogou errado, joga de novo.
Consegue passar o tempo e é muito viciante, já fiz muitos amigos nele e recomendo demaisssss!
Se você enjoar e parar de jogar, pode ter certeza que algum dia você volta de novo.
Descobri que tinha na Steam há pouco tempo e sinto que ele é bem melhor de jogar por aqui do que pelo navegador.
Incrível <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198085421071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1598363597}
review: This is an idle select a task and wait game that you would find for free on the Google play store or even Facebook game with a little more mature theme. It really pushes the pay-to-win aspect, with the premium currency (Diamonds) which isn't necessary. I tell you now, this is something that you can pass and wouldn't miss a thing. Take it from me, the comments should have been read first before deciding to download this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056662399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1596003764}
review:
Par où commencer ???
J'étais curieux... Je croyais tomber sur un jeu crade et beauf et évidemment c'est un peu le cas. 
Un tout petit peu.
Parce que sinon...
CE JEU EST ÉNORME (comme ma b***)
Alors oui, c'est un free to play (pas encore pay-to-win après 9h de jeu), et ça n'est clairement pas un super jeu, ça se laisse gentiment tourner (comme les acteurs) en arrière-plan.
MAIS ! Et toute la subtilité est là : on se tape des barres constamment !!!
Le nom des stars, des studios, des objets. Tout est prétexte à des jeux de mots bien salaces qui vont du crade/beauf au super subtil selon les joueurs.
Faire une lettre de motivation pour un studio, choisir un nom de film ou échanger des messages improbables avec d'autres joueurs : le côté "blagues de fesses" est complètement assumé et en quelques minutes ça me fait ma journée ! ^^
Est-ce que j'y passerais 50h ? Probablement pas.
Mais est-ce que je regrette ? Oh que non !
Je pense que tant que ce jeu me fera rire, j'y reviendrais et si vous avez quelques heures à perdre, ça vaut le coup d'essayer, pour moi c'est une petite pépite d'humour potache qui me fait bien ma raie euh... marrer !

review: I used to play this on another platform. They stopped hosting them. So, BBE offered to transfer accounts to their browser version.  I took them up on their offer. At first, they said they found my account but asked a few questions to verify it was mine because it was a paid account. Then, all of the sudden, I got an email from them stating my account was deleted and there was no way of getting it back. Reading through some of the other reviews, it seems this is a re-occurring problem.

review: Gram w tą gierkę od dawna, od kilku miesięcy na steam i polecam. Jeżeli ktoś lubi RPG i na co dzień nie wstydzi się żartować z tematów dla dorosłych to ta gra może się spodobać. Wszystko estetyczne i czytelne, wykonywanie misji może momentami nudzić. Najlepiej gra się na 'wyższym' lvl'u, ponieważ ma się więcej kontaktu z innymi graczami, walka w zadania jest bardziej zawzięta. Dobra gra do odpalenia w tle, gdy robi się coś innego. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198132995625', 'num_games_owned': 1414, 'num_reviews': 754, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1589805882}
review:
Big Bang Empire
Erotik MMO von 2016.  

Das Leben ist voller Abenteuer - nur nicht in deinem kleinen Städtchen Tellville. Eine Karriere im Erotik-Business ist da offensichtlich der beste Weg um von dort wegkommen. Big Bang Empire wirft einen humorvollen Blick auf die schönste Nebensache der Welt - und das Geschäft drum herum. Erstelle deinen individuellen Star und erobere den Erotik-Olymp. Verbessere deine Skills, sammle abgefahrene Accessoires, schließe dich mit Freunden in einem Studio zusammen, drehe deine eigenen Filme und zeige allen anderen wo der Hammer hängt! 

Das ist der Werbetext und mehr kann ich dazu auch nicht schreiben.
Ich habe das Spiel vier Stunden für euch getestet. 
Dieses Spiel ist wohl nur was für Leute die es auf ihrem Bürocomputer im Hintergrund laufen lassen wollen und ab und an mal reinschauen wollen. Sollte dieses Spiel einen versteckten Sinn haben, dann konnte ich ihn nicht finden. Völlig überflüssiges Game das zudem langweilig ist und ein Zeitfresser noch dazu.

Sucht euch ein anderes, selbst kostenlos ist noch zu teuer.

Hier findet ihr meine Gruppe und mein Archiv mit über 1.000 Reviews. Viel Spaß beim stöbern. 
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/hoi4deu

Big Bang Empire
Erotic MMO from 2016.

Life is full of adventure - just not in your little town of Tellville. A career in the adult business is obviously the best way to get away from there. Big Bang Empire takes a humorous look at the most beautiful thing in the world - and the business around it. Create your individual star and conquer the erotic Olympus. Improve your skills, collect funky accessories, team up with friends in a studio, make your own films and show everyone else where the hammer is!

This is the advertising text and I can't write more about it.
I tested the game for you for four hours.
This game is probably only for people who want to run it on their office computer in the background and want to have a look now and then. If this game made sense, I couldn't find it. Completely superfluous game that is also boring and a time waster.

Find another one, even free is too expensive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040761939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1582987602}
review:
This title is only for those who WAN'T TO PAY A LOT from now 'till eternity to keep advancing. At level 35(ish) you can't advance anymore by fame, and achievable achievements are slowed down to less than once a week. In other words; When your STARTER BOOST expires, there is nothing left 4 u unless you pay. 

Whenever there's a game that uses this strategy, those who play free only serve as cannon fodder for those who pay. Also for casual clicker, there is TONS of futile clicking. Any customization is more expensive than the price of todays top gametitles.

NOT RECOMMENDED. 
...and btw; "Sexual content" is really stretching it here.
-15 out of 5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198378753537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2219, 'last_played': 1581063770}
review:
Игра изначально предлагается бесплатно.
Донат естественно присутствует и может сыграть свою роль минимум в ПвП, что неестественно (лишает игру смысла игры).
Можно ли поиграть (посмотреть) - почему бы и нет = главное во время спрыгнуть.
В принципе есть линейка квестов и заданий, но скажем просто - не затягивает (особенно твои сливы от "честного рандома" по ударам/промахам и урону).
И вроде бы можно поиграть, но с ростом твоего лвл - требуется больше времени твоего присутствия (взять хотя бы съёмку фильма).
Добавочный минусы:
- на день выдаётся определённое количество энергии (иди куда хочешь, но только до забора);
- ты 30лвл, на тебя нападает 40лвл...  такая разница недопустима, полагаю (видел там и 400 уровневых игроков, между ними 10 лвл разницы уже некритична, однозначно).

не больше 5/10 (нарисовали бы хоть посимпотнее, могли и больше срубить).

author: {'steamid': '76561198017476710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 115334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115308, 'last_played': 1600710500}
review:
Deeeeeep! Very Deep game.
Sometimes it drifts into the weeds.
Depends on what you want to do.
How you want to make your fortune.
How you want to improve your skills.

Studios, they're a thing. You know for films.
That's where the gravy is, in films. 
What you do with that gravy, 
well that's your business.
I don't want to know about it.

Hilarious game that doesn't take too long to play.
You can do everything without spending a dime.
I recommend it if you like casual games.
Leave it up while you do other things, click a bit.
Have a duel or ten. Whatever works for  you.

review:
es un juego bien dedicado pero a mi parecer es bueno pero termina callendo en la rutina de aburrido y es por ser muy tacaño en las recompensas
con decir que una tarea tiene un costo por ejemplo:
finalizar una tarea  en 20 minutos tendria un costo de 20 diamantes 
pero .... al pasar 15 minutos el costo sigue igual 20 diamantes
pero... al final casi 30 segundos el COSTO SIGUE SIENDO EL MISMO 20 diamantes
se tendria que actualizar los tiempos
a todo esto me gusta mucho desbloquear los animes
se calificar este juego seria de 10 puntos le doy 3.5

review: Big Bang Empire to erotyzująca (jednakże pozbawiona co bardziej dosadnych obrazków) gra rpg/manager. Prowadzimy gwiazde porno którą możemy dowolnie ubierać. ulepszenia, skrócenia czasu i zmiany przedmiotów mozemy kupic za diamenty które mozna kupować za kase albo zdobywać w grze. Osobiście nigdy ich nie kupowałem i jakoś gram juz ponad 4 lata także nie jest źle. BBE nie jest pozbawiony wad typowego mmo gdyż po prostu nudzi sie z czasem (ale dopiero po około roku) ale mimo tego mogę śmiało polecić gdyż gra jest dość często modyfikowana. moja ocena 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198077267079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 96978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37377, 'last_played': 1587003748}
review:
While it says porn star, it is more of a detective game, you have to figure out how to move up in the game. You get to play multiple things at once and do other things while waiting for missions to finish. Missions need energy and there is a limit on the amount of energy you can get in one day. you can make from 3 to 5 movies a day and you can fight other players. I would suggest joining one of the groups, a group can have 30 members, and have fights with other groups. They also can increase your stats from 10% to 100%
A good game for casual playing

author: {'steamid': '76561198065943640', 'num_games_owned': 465, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 5764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5602, 'last_played': 1585931205}
review:
Замечательная игра сексуального характера и симулятора порно режиссёра. Получил массу веселья и материалов в папке игры для создания своих рисунков, коллажей. Можно сказать что есть немного материала для фанатов. Но это просто файлы игры. Вспомнил об старой игре Wet, где Лула главный персонаж. Жаль что игра временами перестаёт работать и приходится её переустанавливать. Хорошо сочетается с другой такой же игрой Hero Zero. Можно играть одновременно для экономии времени и рахода стамины. 
Категория игры: 18+ рисованная эротика.
Оценка: 10 из 10.
--------------------------------------------------------
Оценка распостранителя игры и его команды: - 10 из 10. 
...................................................................
Таких распостанителей надо уничтожать. Стим не должен иметь такие игры только по причине что игра удаляет своих зарегистрированных игроков! Сколько бы ты не играл, тебя удалят если будешь отсутствовать некоторое время! Такого барахла нам и даром не надо! 
Если поддерживаете, все дружно жалуемся и пишем текст сверху в Стим администрацию. На странице продукта есть справа флажок и меню для жалоб.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093355799', 'num_games_owned': 5830, 'num_reviews': 332, 'playtime_forever': 1922, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1922, 'last_played': 1570996924}
review:
Big Bang Empire is a sexual, free2play idler game where your goal is to create your own porn empire.
By doing missions you'll be able to earn money, diamonds and sexy outfits.
Level up your skills/stats to become stronger and beat other players by fighting them in duels.
You can create your own studio, level it up, unlock bonuses, invite people, enter studio events and fight against other studio's.
The missions are endless and there is more than enough to do!

However, I personally enjoyed it for some time but it gets repetitive and boring fast.
Every mission takes time and can take up to 15 minutes or so.
You can buy diamonds to speed up your progression and also buy outfits etc, but it's not necessary since you'll earn diamonds by playing the game too.

I received items that would give me a bonus boost for a week but it abruptly ended after just 4 days.
Those items cost 99 diamonds each, which is a lot! So yea... that was disappointing.
Upgrading your skills and studio cost a lot too! 
You are able to join studio's, but most are inactive and don't compete in events or duels against other studio's.

It's more of a background game that you can play while doing other things on the PC.
You don't see actual porn, at most, if you're lucky you'll see some nipples lol.
It's a free, simple, sexy and decent time killer that was able to keep me busy for 32 hours!
Therefor, despite being displeased about certain things, I still enjoyed it enough to recommend the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065902081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 23583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23583, 'last_played': 1502474160}
review:
One of my favorite games. I mostly play the mobile and browser versions recently. You are an aspiring porn star trying to make it in the industry. You go on mission to boost the career. Get in "Duels", Work with a studio and produce films. 

I do wish you could change a lot of it to make your characters roles more fitting. I want my character to be a gay porn star. I change all his covers to male costars but other than that you aren't really allowed to specify it. 

I joined a studio with other queer players when I started the game two years ago and have been with the same group since then. They have made the game fun. i love temple challenges. Except for convention temples. Those suck lol. Love the temple system though. Love working in a studio. Studio fights. THe support etc. If your a friend of mine wanting to join the game. Come join King Cobra XXX. 

 I wish there were male pinups available when they added that feature as well. I only do those challenges for the rewards and even then don't seek them out often because i'm not interested in seeing the female nudity. I wish there was a way to block that honestly. It was unavoidable. I had to click to get my reward then click away as fast as I could.  Wish there was more though into making it for everyone. 

As for cost. Saving your diamonds is a must in this game. I wish I had done it more sooner. I've used diamonds accidentally which was the worst and just not utilized them as well as I could in the beginning. Storage upgrade is a great use if you want to save up for a specific temple challenge like I always do. 

I wish there were more male costars available for cash amounts over diamonds. The three that we get a re kind of just okay. It gets repetitive to use them over and over again on covers like I  usually do to try to make my porn releases gay. The costars hasn't shifted since I've started and I think a lot of people would love to see more added in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287734147', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1581363100}

author: {'steamid': '76561198062734664', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1569586601}
review:
I have no idea how this game got "mostly positive" reviews at time of writing. I played it for about three hours, and it crashed six times, resetting progress and time played. Almost zero nudity, heck this doesn't rate "adults only", it's barely beyond PG-13 at best. The game-play is non-existent too. It's no different than those other cookie-cutter freemium games where you push a button, a timer slowly runs down, and you get a bunch of virtual rewards that lets you push a button and wait again.

There needs to be a "super do not recommend" button.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116908229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 22863, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4317, 'last_played': 1674850851}
review:
Um joguinho bem interessante onde vc cria um ator pornô e tenta fazer sucesso. O jogo é totalmente online e além de possuir tradução para o português ainda tem muitos jogadores brasileiros no servidor.

O jogo não é explicito apenas possui a temática sexual é bem legal de se jogar mas é do estilo que para completar uma missão é necessário esperar alguns minutos do mundo real.

Para evoluir bem você precisa de dedicar nem que seja algumas horas por dia e ajudar seu estúdio que é uma espécie de guilda para ganhar bonificações, sendo muito dificil você conseguir evoluir sozinho.

author: {'steamid': '76561198953098408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1366, 'last_played': 1710305974}
review:
The game is fairly basic, and can be a money sink, if you allow it.  Don't trust the stats you have, however, as they are normally a lie.  You might have a 47% crit chance against another player, but expect to never ever crit, same goes for dodge.  
     The game overall is fun and quite interesting.   The level of fun could be greatly improved if they would get rid of the censorship issues in the game.  There are breasts, but most the time they are covered.  Don't expect much else visually, which is sad seeing as you are a porn actress/actor.
     The missions are timed, which means you might sit around for 15 or more minutes waiting for one to complete.  The "shop" seldom has anything for you after level 12, so you'll need it only to change the looks of clothes after level 25 and to sell stuff you get in missions and through rewards.
      If they would get rid of the sensorship, show full nudity and allow for other scenes to show far more, this is a porn game after all, I would rate it higher.  It could easily be a 8 or 9 out of 10  But as it stands, it's at best a 6.5 out of 10.
      Yes, I would recommend the game.  It's fun, but also a game for wasting time with a few rewards for doing so.  The pictures you get as rewards are not worth the time spent getting them, but some of the text, titles and scenes are great.

review: 总的来说我不是很看好这个游戏，先谈优点吧：游戏性还不错，图片也画的不错，各种各样的任务也非常的丰富。但是对于我来这个想看色情内容的人来说语言不通导致任务的标题根本看不懂，就算用翻译软件也不能完全看懂于是为了一张图片要做100个任务有时还不止就算每个任务只要3分钟，300分钟就为了看一张图片还可能不露点实在是一种煎熬，建议同一张图片的任务可以一下子全部做完哪怕一个任务持续4小时。

author: {'steamid': '76561198104303289', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1613605280}
review:
Ignore the negative SJW bullshit about this game. The game is cute and adorable. Yes, it's a time frame game; but who cares. It's just a free game to add to your library and play when your talking on the phone or bored of your other games. The animations and the artwork is super cute and you can create your own character. 

I like it. You don't have to P2W if you don't want to... Just ignore it. But all in all I love this game. And I love how my character looks. It's a good game; and I'm happy I stumbled upon it. Don't let the haters and the 'Eww! Scantly clad girls!' hater-SJW-Republican feminist 'gamers' scare you away... Just try the game and if you don't like it keep truckin'. So thumbs up form me.

review: Возможность создать свою собственную порнозвёздочку и провести её через все пороки к вершинам Олимпа славы! Юморная, в меру пошловатая игрушка, с тоннами шмоток и аксессуаров, всевозможными эвентами, донатом и агрессивно настроенными конкурентами из других студий. Наиграл 1,2k часов и никому не советую повторять. Оно того не стоит и правило "лучше нарисованные, чем никакие" тут не действует :3

review:
Fun casual game, started off as a Flash browser game. 
However, far too buggy when not played in the browser. For a while the standalone client worked really fine, then some update broke too many things. Stopped playing because of that and because of very poor support.
Go play it in the browser, if you'd like to. On Steam I can not recommend it due to the bugs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148451495', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 908, 'last_played': 1533752141}
review:
Crie seu Ator/Atriz Pornô e começe sua jornada Rumo ao estrelato!
Equipe seu personagem com chicotes, roupas de Latex , e vibrador e grave seus filmes +18
''Maquina de Sequisu eu transo igual animal, Chatuba de Mesquita do bonde sequisu anal''
Brincadeiras Apartes vamos ao que interessa  ! Big Bang Empire é um jogo ao estilo navegador, assim como Hero Zero!
Faça missoes , distribua seus pontos de habilidades ao passar de level, equipe seu char, e vá para o duelo !

Prós :
- Tematica engraçada e diferente
- Jogo simples e rápido
- Alta interaçoes nos Clãns

Contras:
- Jogo repetitivo
- Demora para evoluir
- ALTAMENTE PAY TO WIN
- Apresenta alguns Bugs

Considerações Finais : O jogo é legal , divertido , porem os contras acabam pesando demais principalmente o fato de ser pay to win, se você quiser entrar no TOP jogadores do servidor se prepare para desembolsar uma grana

NOTA : 5 / 10

Para mais análises siga minha Curadoria -  [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33315844-Games-Numa-Naise/] Games Numa Naise [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198050939092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 107534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105662, 'last_played': 1528015299}
review:
Its a terrible game. You'll get eaten alive by the pay to win players on top of that. The game is littered with click traps that will make you spend the irlmoney currency. It is playable free to play but you'll find it is soul sucking if you want to stay relevant needing to invest 6+ hours of active play time every day to complete everything.

Don't let my playtime fool you. Most of it was idle in the background (Or chatting with teammates on the very broken chat). If you are reading this heed my warning and walk away and do not look back. If you are already playing, cold turkey it and just uninstall, you're doing yourself a favor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053514042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1548, 'last_played': 1529720063}
review:
The ONLY reason I am recommending this is because it is "free to play."  There is a "buy stuff for real money to advance faster" shop option, but I cannot in good conscience advise anyone to spend more than a nickel (USD $0.05) on this game.  Bottom line: good for a chuckle or two, but not much fun after the first 2 hours.  NOT FOR KIDS!!!  Install it, play for a couple of hours just to say you tried it... and then you will probably want to uninstall it.

WARNING: This game contains suggestive themes, but no actual pornography.  Many of the mission descriptions you will read in this game are lewd or rude, character models are meant to resemble porn star stereotypes, background art is a cartoon version of cheap porno films, and the equipment you can make your character wear is ... um ... freaky at best and skimpy at worst.  NOT FOR KIDS, I would say if you have kids under 11 don't even install this.  Not recommended for kids under 16, in my opinion.  It isn't really that much fun anyway, it is basically a long-running gag about the porn industry.  Good for a laugh for about 15 minutes, maybe an hour... then it gets repetitive and a little boring.  It is a "flash" game, and it is a "clicker" style.  

There are several types of missions you can do as quests (single player), each quest costs a small amount of energy which replenishes every day or you can instantly refresh by spending diamonds (buy more diamonds for real money, or win them from achievements in-game).  Some you need to meet a certain stat requirement (strength, charisma, etc) to complete successfully - they will tell you which stat but not how high it needs to be.  Some are just timed, meaning you wait a few minutes and it completes automatically.  And some are fights - you face off against some enemy in whatever the default background is for that mission.  Those fights, you take turns attacking and you just sort of "blink" when you attack and that's all.  Cheap flash video action.  Completing these quests will get you XP to levelup (raise stats) as well as some in-game cash and occasionally a new piece of equipment or an event item.  There is a shop where you can buy or sell equipment.  There is a film being produced in each city, too, with quests similar to the regular ones but instead of your overall energy they use a resource that is specific to the film studio.  Completing the quests there will let you spend diamonds to upgrade the title and background image on your movie poster. Finishing the movie will let you move to the next city.  Then there is a little multiplayer action where you duel against other players.  This is exactly like the fight quests, it is entirely based on who has the highest stats, and a little bit of luck with dodging and critical hits.  Online duels will earn you glory points so you can rise in the leaderboards.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203711651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 503, 'playtime_forever': 813, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1532790667}
review:
Jogo delicioso literalmente! Apesar da Tematica que pode passar certas imagens com relação ao jogo, este é, no fim das contas, um jogo de RPG muito bem feito e equilibrado. Sempre com atualizações, novas missões e itens para você interagir.

Existe inclusive estúdios de Pro Players e chega a ser incrivel toda a logistica por trás das vitórias de cada estudio. Simplesmente muito bom

author: {'steamid': '76561198058041706', 'num_games_owned': 667, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 728830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239783, 'last_played': 1704145645}
review:
This is a great game to play hella casual.

At the time of this review, my star is nearly level 200~

Contrary to popular belief, this isn't a pay to win style of game, and the microtransactions to buy diamonds are completely optional. It gives you plenty of diamond rewards for just playing the game, so unless you're just really lazy or have way too much cash to spare, buying diamonds doesn't get you much more than the average player, save for a few extra refreshes, extra refinements, extra speed ups and some cosmetics.
There's plenty of fully expanded Studios to join, as they are usually always looking for new players, so you don't even need diamonds to pay for a Studio.

I see a lot of people complaining it's not what they expected. 
Play this game on Nutaku if you want it to be more... graphic; this is the very censored version released for Steam.
As for the people complaining about how Steam has 'fallen low' for hosting this, just remember that there are lot more trashy sex-themed games as well as badly developed indie games that aren't nearly as well done as this game.

Not to mention, the forum is full of moderators that are in contact with the developers, so they're always working to improve and add different things to the game and keep the player-base happy.

I would love to get the in-game successes available as Steam Achievements though, it would definitely feel a lot more worth it to play for Achievement Hunters like myself~
Also, it would be cool if the item sets from Wandas Secret Shop were counted as DLC; if you create a new Star, they won't have the set and you'd have to rebuy it.

Over all, this is game is satirical, and entertaining enough for people not looking for something intense.
It's got fun competition and heaps of little odd bits bobs to do.
So if you're a hardcore casual like me, this game is probably gonna do it for you~

author: {'steamid': '76561198453148732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 369446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27977, 'last_played': 1565914602}
review:
Dicembre 2020
Sono apparsi recensione postive dei soliti noti. Se le leggete noterete che ben 3 sono praticamente identiche, quindi chiara evidenza di rialzare in positivo il giudizio medio del gioco ,che per me rimane tra i più pessimi di tutto lo store, in modo farlocco

è incredibile come il supporto del gioco intervenga attivamente nel game e prenda arbitrariamente decisioni poco trasparenti favorendo alcuni pg gestiti da amici che sono tali nel reale


GIOCO PALESEMENTE inattendibile, Punto.
Chi loda sta schifezza o è in malafede o poco trasparente-

FEBBRAIO 2020 : POI si dice che si fa peccato a pensar male.
Il server 1 italia sta scemando in un impoverimento incredibile di utenti. e per quale motivo è presto elencato e descritto sottp : 
gioco di dubbia gestione, poco trasparente, e ancora più incredibile che i giudizi medi delle recensioni di questo gioco adesso siano molto alte!!!
chiara presenza di addetti playata alla strategia del rialzo su questa robaccia
Fino a 2 mesi fa i giudizi medi erano completamente negativi!!
Di sexy c è ben  poco , Ripetitivo fino alla noia mortale attendendo magari qualche immagine piccante ...l attesa è vana ..
ripetitivo fino a farti diventare pazzo , giocabilità inesistente , role neanche l ombra....
quindi cos è??  Un game per cellulare portato misteriosamente su steam ... controllo dei gestori raccapricciante , tant è che loro stessi giocano , modificando in corso svolgimento parametri a loro favorevoli ...

Se fosse altro sarebbe da denuncia .
Inizialmente parrebbe pure accattivante e piacevole .  Credete di competere con altri player reali ma  rimarrete delusi . Il server italiano 1, è stracolmo di multiaccount mai bannati, giocatori che utilizzano bot illegalmente per far progredire i loro pg. Considerate che su 250 personaggi ci saranno 30/35 utenti reali

.non spendeteci manco 20 centesimi .

Chi contesterà la mia recensione , ò è in malafede oppure uno dei gestori del gioco . Spesso entrambe le cose....
Peccato perchè l idea sviluppata meglio sarebbe stata molto ma molto interessanti e con altre ambizioni di successo.
P.S. A coloro che hanno recensito positivamente del gioco : Per essere cosi entusiasti sarete tra quelli che possiedono 50 pg con relativi account .
QST il grosso problema , non  c è un controllo accessi reali .
GIUDIZIO FINALE : Da evitare di perderci tempo ma soprattutto denaro

author: {'steamid': '76561198053083938', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 11063, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10969, 'last_played': 1518139101}
review:
This game gets you about half way there, if you know what I mean.... actually, it gets you halfway to enjoyment, but never really delivers. To shorten this review in one blurb: 

Big Bang Empire is a porn themed game that shows no nudity and plays like a 2008 facebook game. It has energy cool downs, pay to win mechanics, an endless grind with no benefit to higher levels or gear, and you can spam your "friends" with requests for energy. Most of your time is spent idling this game while playing something else, only switching back to click a button, then alt-tabbing back to another game.

This is one giant time sink with no value or memorable experiences what-so-ever. 1/10.

edit: spelling

author: {'steamid': '76561198114788467', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 5249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5249, 'last_played': 1518968424}
review:
This is a free porn parody game.
Be the pornstar of your dreams, make pornos, fight pornstars, put some cloths on and make senpai notice you.
The pornstars can look kinda cool, sassy or derpy.
The music isn't something to write home about, the animation is almost none existant, the story and the community isn't something to write home about either.
There are no badges, cards or achievements.
If you like to play a basic porn game with some nipples in it without going onto pornsights then this might be a game for you.
Have fun, enjoy and don't forget the buttplug :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198061702619', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 2051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1544, 'last_played': 1526829739}
review:
I dont recomend. Fap to win. lol.


---
Şaka bir yana oynanabilir. Hero zero diye bir oyun vardı onun aynısı. Sadece konsept değişmiş kahraman değil porno film yıldızı olmuşsunuz. Espirikli falan böyle.. Fazla müstehcen +18 lik bir şey yok oyunda. Normal bir kaç seksi kıyafet belki o kadar. Birde bir iki ses efekti. Arada oynuyorum karakter geliştirmesi hoşuma gidiyor. Gene aynı oyun karakter yaratıyor onu istediğiniz gibi geliştiriyor seviye atlıyor diğer oyuncular ile yarışıyorsunuz. Bütün millet str can falan yüklenirken. Kaçınmaya abanıp şöyle dodge karakter yapmak falan hoş.

Kötü yanı: Ekran boyutu çok küçük. Sanırım mobil oyundan port etmişler. Adam akıllı pc ayarlarına çevrilmemiş bile.

Ha birde film çekme kısmı var oyunda. Film kapak resmi ve ismi başlık atıyorsunuz. Oralarda biraz +18 müstehcen isimler görebilirsiniz. Orası hafiften rahatsız edebilir. O tarz başlıkları görmekten haz etmeyen insanlara. Cinsellik olarak +18'lik olarak o kısım var bi. +18 üzerinin oynaması daha makul. Küçüklerin oralarda çirkin kelimer okuması uygun olmaz.

Yok asi tüpçü bilmem ne lol :D Büyük sever mever saçma sapan bir ton şey yazmışlar/yazıyorlar :d

author: {'steamid': '76561198164033716', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1511096690}
review:
Big Bang Empire est un ... un "jeu" où on attend que le temps passe pour finir des missions. Le jeu a pour principe de ne jouer que sur des allusions sexuelles sans grandes réussites pas ailleur vu qualité humoristique des dévellopeurs et c'est tout... ya bien un moyens de personnaliser son personnage mais.... ça pue la *****.

Mais bref voici l'écaluation :

Graphismes : 
☐ Des étoiles dans mes yeux !
☐ Très bons 
☐ Bons
☐ Acceptables
☑ Moches
☐ Aggression
Le dessin est franchemant immonde... Tout est basé sur un espèce de genre coloré et dessiné puis colorié par ta soeur de 5 ans 1/2 ... Le tout est de très mauvais goût sans grande création ...

Jouabilité : 
☑ easy magle !
☐ Jouable avec une bonne prise en main
☐ Difficilement jouable
☐ Injouable/ Affreux
A be c'est facile de le prendre en main vu que tu ne joueras pas dans ce jeu ! tu as juste à clicker sur la mission ou un menu et voila !

Durée de vie :
☐ IMMORTELLE !
☐ Extrêmement longue
☐ Longue
☐ Bonne 
☐ Acceptable
☐ Trop courte
☐ Du vol.
Je préfère ne pas donner d'idée je me suis arrété au niveau 4 parceque sa devenait beaucoup trop dur pour mes neuronnes mais c'est comme tout c'est aléatoire le placement des missions donc c surement infinit... ujne crasse infinimment mauvaise et longue en plus....

Bande son (bruitages + musiques) : 
☐ Un véritable concerto!
☐ Très bonne
☐ Bonne
☐ Classique
☑ Mauvaise
☐ Saignement oditif !
Même ça ils ont ratés c'est simplement long, mou et très légerment même totalement ennuyant. Sans parler du fait que  la qualité sonore est pourrit les sons sont pourris et même les effets sont en téléchargés je penses ...

Scénario : 
☐ Waw !
☐ Très agréable et prenant
☐ Intéressant !
☐ Acceptable mais sans plus
☑ Mais où est le scénariste ?
L'histoire est simplement de "devenir le plus beau grand acteur porno pour que tout le monde écartent leurs cuisses" celon leurs mots ....... dès lors tout est dit je nai rien à ajouter.

Rapport qualité/prix :
☐ Gratuit 
☐ A ce prix là c'est donné !
☐ Bon prix
☐ Satisfaisant
☐ Discutable…
☑ Racket organisé !
Parceque même gratuit je devrais être payé pour avoir joué 15 minutes à cet étron ! c'est simplement une machine à fric faite pour le buzz sans histoire ni fun ni jeu ni même le moindre point d'attache avec le joueur... même un jeu portable ou un clicker t'envoie du plus lourd c'est pour dire .....

Surtout, sous aucuns prétextes, même si l'envie de tuer quelqu'un vous vient, n'installez jamais Jamais ce ...truc !!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010274419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 223, 'playtime_forever': 59302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 850, 'last_played': 1629678634}
review:
[b]Summary[/b]
A free casual idler time-sink pornstar "RPG" game. From what I gather, it's also a browser game that's uncensored. Play a lot like other idler games on facebook and such. Pretty easy in general, but it's also funny at least. Mainly solo play, but a slice of multiplayer with autoplayed duels and joining other studios (guilds).

[b]My Gripes[/b]
[list][*]Lots of minor spelling and grammar errors.
[*]In dire need of achievements since it's on Steam.
[*]Follows a lot of other templates set by other idler time-sink games.
[*]Fullscreen?
[*]Censored.[/list]

[b]Rating[/b]
It's not bad, but it's nothing amazing.

[b]4/10[/b]

review: I huge con is that is is one of those real time FB format RPGs. However, it does have a weird, corny charm to it. It's easy to play missions in the background. There is a decent character customization system, and it allows you to pour in game "money" into your stats so you can have your preferred "armor." It's a fun time waster that you don't have to buy into the whole "pay to win" deal to have fun.

review: its a cute game and has recieve many new features. however it lacks reason to play and completing all of your daily missions it a time drain. this game is also availiable on your phone and facebook which leads us to the next problem. it does not transfer accounts well. if you start the game on steam you can only log in on steam. if you start on the android app you can only logg in on the app. same thing with playing through facebook. You can "unbind account" from steam to log in from your favorite internet browser but after you unbind you will not be able to log in from steam anymore.

review: This game is really fun to play and easy to hide in the background if doing other stuff online. The only thing I don't like is the PvP system, but then I've never really been a fan of PvP in general in games. The background stories behind each mission & events add that little extra detail that makes the game fun & worth playing if the promise of full character customizing didn't already grab you're attention.
