author: {'steamid': '76561198275101876', 'num_games_owned': 81, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 435896, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 302299, 'last_played': 1674675916}
review:
Je ne conseille nullement ce jeu a mes relations comme aux autres joueurs. 
Un seul mot pour le décrire : A BANNIR !!!!! 

Les dépenses de ce jeu deviennent extrême et aucune MAJ est faite hormis pour annoncer de nouveaux vêtements (coloris, nouveautés,…) devenant de plus en plus coûteux a avoir et donc plus rare a obtenir sans dépenses (box, événements, pyramide de la chance,etc…). Les joueurs les plus lourds vont jusqu’à dépensé + 800€ par mois, pour garder la meilleur position sur les classements, engagent les joueurs les plus motivés et n'hésitant pas a faire du ménage quand cela deviens nécessaire ou encore pousse le vice en vous attaquant tous les jours (duel). En dehors des évolutions de personnages et de studio, les événements de type convention (unique), deviens souvent des silences radios en dehors des temples. Niveau social a fuir si vous cherchez la tranquillité ou le social ! Les joueurs comme les joueuses cherchent et poussent souvent le vice très loin a de harcèlement ou des échanges se**elles. N’hésitant pas a réclamer leurs positions de libertinages ou encore d'objets.

Côté support,obligation de passer par le forum,création d'un compte forum avec nom du personnage que vous jouez et création d'un ticket,avec déclaration et screenshot qui sert a rien et qui peut prendre des heures voir des jours selon la demande. (complet ou non) Les admis ou les modos du forum, ne sont clairement pas des pros et attendre une action de leur part est comme demandé a ses petits enfants de venir nous voir. 

Le jeu nous privent du vision clair sur certains joueurs venant juste pour le plaisir de jouer a des joueurs pervers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000922770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 98249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48258, 'last_played': 1582929809}
review:
Pretty good game. Don't believe that it is P2W because it's not. Doing missions and just regular play will get you a lot of diamonds. You can pay for diamonds but they aren't really worth it and it's pretty expensive. Join a studio that is already maxed out stats if you want the best experience. Play regularly and you will do fine. It's not terrible but it's a time waster.

If you want easy entertainment with not a lot of difficulty: this is it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198214358240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1556347202}
{'steamid': '76561198161070934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1246, 'last_played': 1499891809}
review:
People who don't like casual Apps (apps, not actual games) like this are the type of people that don't actually understand how fun it is to engage in such menial tasks, which often prove themselves the much needed break from the softcore games which many gamers delve into proclaiming they're hardcore to begin with. It's not meant to be a retardedly difficult auto-confirm combo, button mashing, min-maxing, shitstorm with a playerbase boasting skill where it lacks such skill entirely.

The features in this game clearly state where it's coming and going...
Humorous comic style
Individual character creation
Funny missions
PvP against other stars
GvG against other studios
Sexy outfits and accessoires

It's a casual game, free to play, enjoyable by the laughs alone. Anyone with half a mind can plainly see it's 95% satire and 5% poking fun at everyone that would claim this game sucks.

All in all, I love it; the missions are simple, the "PvP" is straightforward, the level up and stat boosting process are clean. Ideally I'd like to see some form of alternate animation other than full cell movement, different sounds, and perhaps a UI that allows resolution changes to fit your window (often the lower portion of mine is clipped). It has a Pay-to-Win system in place that's pretty obvious, and otherwise does not suggest it isn't that type of game; alone in its transparency I would like to add if you're angry at the App for being pay-to-win, you've lost yourself to ego.

I'm not one for pixel nudity to be honest, so this and Hero Zero are contending for my attention between games.

It's something to do while you're waiting for other stuff, and is a great background game that requires minimal attention, and can satiate that "Completionist" need from time to time. There are much worse games out there than this one...much, much worse.

review:
Existe um esquema de corrupção internamente. Pessoas tem contas banidas sem quebrar as regras, basta um "estudio" (como é chamado os grupos) se juntarem e te reportarem. O suporte dá ban na conta sem explicações e sem sequer checar o ocorrido.

O jogo é movido a "diamantes" (cash) que custam mais do que bons jogos aqui na steam. Não recomendo á ninguem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070916659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 146623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33936, 'last_played': 1537488960}
review:
Surprisingly good! Most of the bad reviews are just complaining about the fact that it's a click and wait game. However, if you're like me and you know there are much worse genres out there than click and wait (let's not name them here lest we offend the fanboys...), and if you don't mind the adult theme (and really, the game is barely R rated), give it a try, it's free!
Also, BBE is just the sexy version of Hero Zero (Playata's other click and wait game), so if you want a more in depth review, check out the one I did for that game. Everything in it applies to BBE as well.

review:
if you like Lula Wet Empire on DOS 1998, this game has that similar vibe but more in-depth with  Point and click Role-playing game, while the game have been subjectively bad on interaction with other players. thankfully the quirky  art style and some interesting characters on this game is kind of funny. 

PROS
+ Games for Adult  
+ Fun Game
+ Easy Reward
+ Funny/Cheesy Game
+ Easy to   Play
+ worldwide Currency supported pretty affordable F2P game
+ addicting if you had  the time to invest to play this game
+ interesting concept 


Cons and suggestion -

- lack interaction with other players
+ Suggestion put Lobby Chat when not playing
-  animation sucks.... 
+ Suggestion  fix that damn boring battle animation, or at least make the characters more dynamic then just  looking at stiff sonic booms lol.
-  DLC needed  to start off  with reasonable stats " Wouldn't mind spending for it to save money"

review:
Jogo de fazer missao, só clickar upar o putão ou a putinha, compra uns equip pra deixa eles mais vadião possível.
Da pra lutar contra os outros oponentes, os equips dao stats e você upa de lvl e upa stats. Obviamente os diamentes são as melhores "moedas" e é possível comprar então os tops players sao robados. típico pay to win mas é divertido pra quem curte este tipo de jogo. Já joguei muitos jogos parecidos no iPad. 
Pra quem gosta é divertido, muda a temática mas o estilo de jogo é o mesmo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048974498', 'num_games_owned': 2973, 'num_reviews': 812, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1480944680}
review:
Wow, that's some interesting game design right there. Big Bang Empire makes you wait a certain number of minutes to magically complete a "mission", but you can of course speed this process up by spending real-world money like a complete nincompoop. Think of it as a sub-standard "clicker" game with an inkling more interactivity, and you're pretty close.

   They say that porn and video games are two of the major forces pushing technology forward, but this product proudly catapults both fields all the way back to the stone-age. Your time would honestly be better spent having a quick, tawdry wank whilst your parents are out shopping.

Verdict: 3.5/10.

review:
Este juego lo instale, jugué, cree un personaje (Rouge the bat en versión humana para ser exactos) llegue al nivel 6 todo ayer y hoy en la mañana. Mi notbook lo desinstalo porque tenia un virus (no era de extrañarse).

4/10 le daría un 3 pero si elijes a una chica la puedes dejar en topless y es bueno para pasar un rato y tenerlo como experiencia propia.

Mi recomendación si eres un adolescente o adulto empedernido y quieres ver chicas en 2d desnudas. Es que busques juegos gratis Online en paginas especiales como newgrounds, Zone Archive y/o funny-games adult games. No saben como me han ayudado esos juegos en mi adolescencia y tienen mejor animación y acción. 
Saludos.

I can not recommend this game to anyone, however, if my review makes it sound like something for you, the price tag of free shouldn't get in the way of trying it.  It's only 108 MB, so, shouldn't take long to install and try.  There's no actual nudity, or porn, for anyone thinking that there is, crazy stupid exposed outfits, but that's about as close as it gets.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085551904', 'num_games_owned': 1072, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1478966891}
review:
Beh non ci siamo, come ho trovato questo gioco? 
Stavo sfogliando la lista dei suggerimenti, quando mi appare questo gioco, a occhi bendati lo scarico, ero curioso di vedere che gioco avevano fatto.
Entrato (nel gioco), mi trovo la schermata della creazione personaggio, scelgo la femmina poiché non mi va di vedere un uomo a torso nudo e col pacco duro. Fatto il personaggio seguo il semplice tutorial, che mi ha rotto le balls dopo i primi 30 secondi. Finito il tutorial, beh si clicca robe e si compra roba, si arriva al lv 9 per vedere cosa si fa nella modalità film, uno pensa, ci saranno scene hot, e invece no! Voleviiii?! 
Anche li solo clic e clic e clic e clic, avete capito?
C'è anche la modalità dove si "combatte" contro altri giocatori, ma non si fa nulla, si sentono solo suoni che simulano le botte e il personaggio non fa nessuna animazione, sbatte solo contro il suo avversario. 
Comunque, qualcuno di voi si sta chiedendo, ma in sto gioco si deve shoppaere per forza?
Sni, mi spiego, dopo circa mezz ora di gioco se uno non vuole perdre la vita ad aspettare, deve per forza spendere i diamanti (la valuta a pagamento), se uno non spende deve aspettare minuti o ore prima di andare avanti con la storia o con i film.
Graficamente assomiglia a un gioco per cellulare, non si può mettere in full screen e si é obbligati a tenerlo in una finestra quadrata.
In conclusione..
Vi consiglio di non scaricarlo, perdete solo tempo, perche non é:
-Divertente
-Non é Hot
-Non da sfida 
-È ridicolo

author: {'steamid': '76561198007471259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 115434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10218, 'last_played': 1499269451}
review: Actually one of the fairer Free to Play games, 8/10! You can fight, do missions and find better clothes for you avatar and do up to 3 films per day. You get rewards for finishing certain amount of missions, and are often rewarded the in game currency Diamonds, which you can also buy with real money. In contrast to other such games, you get quite a lot of these by just playing the game... only for building your own Studio, you need to buy them (in game earned ones dont count, thats the only turn off I found so far). The text is a bit funny, sexy and raunchy... and your (female) Avatar can look quite sexy in the right clothes, but I play this now for 2-3 weeks, and still find it entertaining and I want to get better and better and find better stuff... and that all for free.

review:
원나잇 창녀 or 창남부터 시작하여, 프로 AV배우로 양성시키는... 음... 그냥 옷 갈아입히기 게임입니다.

장점
1. 반복 노가다지만, 스테이지마다 배경, 인물들이 각자의 개성이 넘쳐서 그런지 그림체는 괸찮습니다.

단점

2. 플래이 방식이 뭔가 어중간합니다.(퀘스트는 랜덤, 10분동안 pvp, 세트장 전부 하면 다음 미션은 그냥 켜두는 겁니다...

review:
Big Bang Empire ist ein amüsantes und auch etwas schlüpriges Online-Rollenspiel. Das Free-to-Play Spiel lässt den Spieler einen angehenden Pornodarsteller spielen der sich durch verschiedene Missionen und Aufgaben eine Karriere zum Pornostar erarbeitet. review:
Dows anybody remember a game called [b]BIING![/b] from the late 90's?

- ... unless you pay money to wait a little less long
- the only mature content in the game (that i could find) was the word "dildo"

This is just another idler hoping to prove that "(alledged) sex sells"

author: {'steamid': '76561197995768099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 34526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 772, 'last_played': 1498959172}
review: O que eu posso dizer de Big Crash Empire... oh, o Crash é da quantidade de vezes que o jogo caiu aqui, pelo menos ele consegue voltar onde parou, o que evita de ser completamente desesperador. A animação em geral é fraca, realmente lembra do velhos jogos em flash que se jogava no Newgrounds e outros sites que tanto tiveram sucesso a algum tempo atras... não é ruim, mas também não é nada inovador, lembra muito os jogos do facebook, onde você pode pedir ajuda a amigos ou usar itens comprados com dinheiro para avançar mais rapido. Não vou colocar como não recomendado, mas não espere nada melhor do que você acharia para jogar em um celular de baixo custo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050299190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 413, 'last_played': 1473663734}
review:
Ya desde que ves el tráiler sabes a lo que te enfrentas: es un juego cómico y estilo Facebook y Android donde se te consume la energía y todo va enfocado a los micro pagos.
Si aceptas esto y abrazas el juego con amor, verás que de entrada el arte que contiene es muy bonito, los escenarios y los personajes tienen colores muy vivos y a pesar de tener un alto contenido humorístico, no descuída el aspecto visual y está sorprendentemente bien estructurado. Las misiones y la forma de jugar no pierden nunca su lógica, es bastante fiel aunque desenfadado a la realidad de la vida de una chica que está empezando en el mundo del porno.
¿La mejor manera de jugarlo? No tomárselo demasiado en serio: es ideal para ir haciendo las misiones (ya que todas requieren un mínimo de tiempo para cargarse) mientras juegas a otra cosa más activa.
Me hubiera gustado mucho que no tuviera el inconveniente del gasto de energía ya que sólo te limita el número de acciones que puedes hacer diariamente, pero me ha entretenido mucho.

author: {'steamid': '76561198290932087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 221949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9354, 'last_played': 1707139868}
review: Oyun hiçte abartıldığı gibi pornografi içermiyor..Ama tabikide belli bir yaşta olmanız gerekiyor oda 15+ olur olsa olsa ki onun nedeni de konusu. Konusundanda anlaşılacağı gibi bu bir p*rno yıldızı yaratma oyunu ve oyunda karakterinizi istediğiniz şekilde giydirip kullanabiliyorsunuz (Mecazi anlamda değil gerçek anlamda kullanmak çünkü bu bir pornografi oyunu :D) Gerçekten ilginç bir konuya sahip çünkü bunun kulvarında olan hiçbir oyunda böyle bir konu yok. Oyunu Gerçekten sevdim ve bunu yazarkende altta oyunda film çekiyorum ( tabikide erotik film :D) Yazacağım pek fazla bişey yok oyun basit görev yaptıkça deneyim ve banknot kazanıyorsunuz böylece yeni kıyafetler yeni görevler ve yeni bölgeler açarak porno kariyerinize şöhret katıyorsunuz hal böyle oluncada film çekerek şöhretinizi arttırabiliyorsunuz.. Amaç basit olabildiğince çok hayran ve deneyim toplayarak en iyi porno yıldızı olabilmek. Bence 15+ yaşındaysanız yükleyip bir deneyin ama bu tarz oyunları konusu nedeniyle pek fazla kişi oynamaz..(50+ amcalar hariç :D)..

author: {'steamid': '76561197977587610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3165, 'last_played': 1486488462}
review:
Big Bang Empire is a game that i would catagorise in the facebook category.
Kinda like maffia style dueling, improving your character and clan, but then everything in a porn theme.

- The artwork is not bad but not great in a cartoonish karikature style.
- The options of customising your character are cool, but there is usually no compromise between cosmetic value and usefulness. So as you level up you will have to say goodbye to your sexy nurse outfit.

What it succeeds most in, is rewarding the players who actually put time into the game.  All too often a player is rewarded for how many days he has been playing compared to how intensive he has been playing. But this game's timings seem just about right so you can progress faster compared to somebody who only plays 2 hours a day.

I recommend this game bacuse it doesn't suck. But like most facebookgames (that's why i catagorised it like this), most people will probably grow tired of it within weeks.


Edited:
I went from recommending this game to not recommending it. After the positive things i wrote here, i have to admit that they really screwed this game up. From around level 15 for studio's you cannot progress further unless you pay and buy diamonds. For most of the tasks you would like to do; for example change your profile picture, you get enough free diamonds. However to upgrade your studio further you have to pay 100 diamonds for each level! Not only that but they also made the game buttons very tactical. Sometimes actions require money, sometimes diamonds. However there is no confirmation needed, so that way you are bound to spend your free diamonds, that you worked hard to get, on useless actions by accident.
I see a lot of people stopping to play around this level and i can fully understand why now, as i will do the same.

review:
Powiem tyle. Gra jest nadwyraz ciekawa. Mimo tematyki oraz typu rozgrywki które raczej nie przyciągają wiemu... no może poza tematyką..  W każdym razie mimo infantylności gry jest ona na prawdę fajna i daje na prawdę dużo zacieszu. Samo kreowanie postaci jest proste. To samo z rozgrywką. Jeśli chodzi o model F2P to nie jest najgorszy. Osobiście zostałem zaatakowany przez kilka osób które definitywnie wpłaciły kilka dolców na tą grę a dostały baty od mojego rudego awatara. Druga metoda płatności czyli Diamenty jest możliwa do zdobycia poprzez wykonywanie misji, pokonywanie innych awatarów, wypełnianie celów (n.p. Weź udział w bitwie studiów + 20 Diamentów) oraz podobnie jak w SMITE (Krzyształy) za codzienne logowanie. 
Poza tym wszystkim to gra ta przynosi dużo frajdy, beki i jest świetna do zabawy z kilkoma znajomymi. A sam rozwój postaci jest bardzo satysfakcjonujący. Poza tym sytuację tutaj oddaje pewien wierszyk 
"Na górze cycki
Na dole cycki
Cycki są fajne
Cycki."
Gorąco polecam :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1472392496}
review:
Big Bang Empire is a free to play stat based multi-player RPG web browser / mobile game in a flat 2D world.  It worked on Win 10, played ok, sounded ok, looked ok.   The game is a stupid but sexy tease ,that is censored for Steam age group: Teen up to 18.  It has PVP that looks like you are bumping card board cutouts together.  The animation looks terrible.  Looks like a reskined Hero Zero or Operation X from the same Developer.  The game get repetitive and boring after short period of time.  Everything you do has an increasing timer of real time.  

You probably could save your time by watching youtube gameplay of this game, instead of playing it.  

Try it, but delete it before you pay real money or get bored with it.  

The Nutaku version of this game is 18 plus but still not worth playing compared to all the other games on Nutaku dot net.

For more info:

author: {'steamid': '76561198064469963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1472463105}
review:
Pograłem ponad 10h w tą grę i wydaje mi się, że mogę ją obiektywnie ocenić.
Na pochwałę zasługuje oprawa graficzna która nie może się nie podobać.
Prosty, nawet trochę kiczowaty styl rysunkowy fajnie pokreśla tematykę gry.
Nie jest przy tym wulgarny. Tak jakby na do oglądania i tak już różowego porno-świata
ktoś jeszcze nam podał różowe okulary. Od strony dżwiękowej nie da powiedzieć się nic poza
tym - dźwięki są. Osobiście wyciszyłem je prawie do minimum bo ah-y i oh-y postaci z czasem
zaczeły męczyć. Rozgrywka jest banalna i przypomina przeglądarkowe gry takie jak np. Bitefight.
Prosty system oparty na 4 statystykach które zawsze będą dla nas za niskie. 
Zresztą najlepiej sprawdzić samemu. Pozycja nie wymaga wiele czasu żeby powiedzieć "dość" 
lub "jeszcze chwilka".
Osobiście traktuje ją jako dodatek. Poprostu jest sobie okno włączone gdzieś w tle
gdzie zajrzę w przerwie miedzy rozgrywami w ambitniejszych grach.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066914428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1472451815}
review:
[h1] "Браузерная <<игра>> для спермотоксикозников должна оставться в браузере, если, кончено, она вообще имеет право на существование"[/h1] 

Моё мнение о "жанре" в целом - в эти недоигры может играть либо ребёнок, у которогу в силу возраста мозг еще не может понять, что это за дерьмо; либо люди 40+, которые сидят в социальных сетях и не слыхивали о нормальных играх; либо отбитые идиоты. В море дерьма под название "Браузерные Игры" плавают 2-3 кораблика-патрульщика, которые не дают выйти этому коричневому морю из берегов, но их всего 2-3 и ситуация вряд ли когда-то изменится, спасательный флот с очистительными сооружениями на борту никогда не попадёт в это море, т.к злобным пиратам выгодно плавать в море дерьма, механизм успешно функционирует (сложная метафора).

Непосредственно о Big Bang Empire. Стандартная сосалка реальных денег и времени, в лучших традициях браузерных игр аля "Ферма", "Тюряга" и т.д. Если вы когда-то мечтали или мечтаете стать порно-актёром и являетесь идиотом, то эта игра для вас. Дёшевая поделка, чтобы срубить бабла. Стим, за что? За что ты рушишь дамбу между светлым морем и морем говна? Эх... 1/10 (единичка за название и за неординарность в выборе сеттинга).

P.S. Самое печальное, судя по онлайну, в это кто-то играет...

review:

"3/10. Facebook game." According to My Own Ratings.

Click. Wait a few minutes. Come back and click again. Annoy your friends until they unfriend you. Annoy random people. Befriend random people and annoy them anyways.
That's it for the basic game mechanics. All you need is a theme on top of it and you have a facebook game. This game's theme was porn. Porn is good. This game should be good. But it's a facebook game, so I can't recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970267156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1472397039}
review: Eeesh... The only positive thing I can say about this game is it has a lot of polish on the cartoonie graphics--the backrounds, props, and characters are all very well drawn. My advice to the developers: Rethink and redo. This game might actually be playable if it was a real point-and-click adventure with cell animation, like Leisure Suit Larry, not some microtransaction clickbait driven by greedy enteprenuers and insipid "yes-men/idiots." This game just leaves me wishing I hadn't clicked on the "play now" button. It became physically and emotionally painful after the first three minutes of...well...I guess we'll call it play? Now I have to go figure out how to permanently remove this game from my account AND my memory. Unfortunately, time cannot gouge out the mind's eye.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975626528', 'num_games_owned': 597, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 5745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3043, 'last_played': 1599720685}
review: Quite a fun little diversion from some of the other clicker-type games on Steam.  With tongue firmly planted in cheek, the developers have created a game that takes a satirical look at the porn industry, and incorporates a ton of fun.  Although I haven't been playing long, it doesn't (yet?) feel the least bit grindy, and successes that improve stats, give diamonds, money, clothing, or experience flow frequently just through standard play.  The main drawback that I have currently is that a constant internet connection is required, so those with limited or metered bandwidth may have issues.  All in all, a great FTP experience if you have time to "waste".

author: {'steamid': '76561198163139190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1472358770}
review: This game isn't meant to be serious.  If you like free to play games that are just meant as a joke then this is for you.  In my opinion this type of game doesn't fit on steam.. It's more of an andriod/IOS game.  But let me explain something to the simple minded folk out there.  This is a free to play game, but not free to develope game.  Free to play games cost anywhere from thousands to millions to create.  They need to get their money back somehow.  You just playing it doesn't help them earn money.  They could put ads on there, but most people hate ads, so they went the micro transaction route. It allows the cheap bastards to play a game for free and the rest of us to pay if we feel like it and speed up the game progress.  If you don't like micro transaction games, well, you're out of luck, even triple A games that cost $60 are starting to do it.  Shame on those slimy dicks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088834253', 'num_games_owned': 4414, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1472336455}
review:
If you like the (mission success = stamina + time or pay currency) point and click games that are prolific on the mobile platform, and want to add a skin-deep layer of theme flavored to becoming a male or female porn star, then you may like this game. 

Some of the quests and art are funny, the elements of online with other players are fun without feeling too forced if that's not your thing, and just enough attention has been paid to the theme to sorta feel like you're playing a game about porn stars. Maybe. 

I played it to see if you can be male or female and then choose to be in straight or gay adult movies, so I would know whether or not I can recommend it for "Gay Interest" lists. And, in a way, you can. You choose the co-star in your movies, and they can be the same sex. I guess that counts. 

I recommend this game ONLY if the above is of any interest to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071270434', 'num_games_owned': 1374, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1472324327}
review:
Обычно я не пишу обзоры на такой хлам, просто потому что ему не место в Стиме и его здесь очень мало, а то что проползает сразу в своём большинстве  получает негативные отзывы, но тут увидел этот выблеванный через руки разрабов кусок программного кода со смешанными отзывами и вспомнил [b]WET - The Sexy Empire[/b] , по-настоящему отличный бизнес-симулятор порноимперии - с юмором и соответствующим контентом, и не удержался.
Что же предстваялет из себя вот эта позорная жертва аборта от геймдева? Донатную мутоту с таймером времени, громкими звуковыми оповещениями, плюс блевотно-ублюдочная стилистика, свойственная таким мусорным проектам.
Пожалуйста, выпускайте свои доильни на мобилки, да в социальные сети, здесь они не нужны.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156047825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1472381466}
review:
Rigged asf,P2W (reset shop,diamond items) limited amount of missions/duels per day unless pay with diamonds earned with quests or purchased with real money (P2W or Pay to Advance whatever you wanna call that)

as for the rigged part you never ever get enemies on the duels tab with inferior stats to yours,lets say you have more strenght charisma nor finesse,your enemy will ALWAYS have one stat superior to yours,whats the point of progression if you can't beat anyone? it would be more fair if as you advance you get paired with stronger oponents and not at early game,so i will drop this,if you know about clash of titans or zombies ate my pizza avoid this game at any cost,is just a crash grab for the addicted in browser games and nothing else.

EDIT: Remember when i said above that enemies will always have atleast one stat better than yours? yes this is still the case but the worse is there is  ALOT of rng on top of that, even if you have lets say 30+ on 3 stats on compared to your enemy,so don't think that with overall better stats you win a dual because thats not the case,my advice is complete the tutorial,burn all the free diamonds you get,do some films and then when you burn all your free stuff unistall the game,the game is ok until the "free" aspect of it ends ofc :).

EDIT2: Below i will save you the trouble and tell how the game works

You have 4 stats,for each level up you get two (2) points to spend on which stat you want,to level up you need exp which is acquired doing missions which are time based,to skip the waiting part you can pay with diamonds acquired via achievements or purchased with real money,but don't be fooled the amount gained via achievements is not enough to skip these missions timers as they will be burned very VERY fast,to play missions you need energy ranging from 4 energy to 16 (how far I want,so probably more at late game) you have an total of 100 energy per day,which is reseted on server reset,after you reach a set amount of energy (lets say 50) you can choose to refill it with either credits or diamonds (who would have guessed right?) but keep in mind thats only possible 4 times per day with credits,otherwise only diamonds,now for filming,which is were your epic items will come from (common,rare,epic items) after you reach lvl 8 you get to make films (3 per day),each film requires a set of missions to be done,and like the energy system here you find a similar system but WORSE,you only have 30 points and you need to complete X amount of missions(tasks) to reach 100% of that film,each mission ranging from 4 to 9 points each (remember you only have 30) after you can't complete more missions due to low amount of points you must recharge it with diamonds or guess wait (duhh?? no pay to advance at all,right? right?) and to refill 15 of these points 5 diamonds are nedeed,after you complete a film you get rewarded with the listed items accordinaly to your rating (1,2 or 3 stars),IF you want to do another film you must wait ONE FUCKING HOUR or pay 19 FUCKING diamonds to make another one...

Pros:
Stat Progression (for those who like it,example: dodge/tank/full hp builds)

Cons:
Diamonds
Wait X amount of minutes/Hours
Diamonds
Wait X amount of minutes/Hours
Diamonds
Wait X amount of minutes/Hours
Diamonds

after further research I concluded that,this game,is the exact same thing as any other Browser P2W game,shame really,because if you were to remove the energy bar and the waiting time between missions,tasks,films this game would be actually enjoyable,but eh,money speaks louder when we put the word developer in play right?

Sorry for the big wall of text,i just needed to rant about any "bad" game,and this one got my attention /rant

review:
Какого черта она тут? Этому тут не место. Я недоволен не столько пошлятиной сколько тем что это совершенно не игра (Я играл в это через браузер год назад и возвращятся не собираюсь).

Об этой игре нечего говорить, донатская игра с упором на донат и пошлятину.
Big Bang появившись здесь означает только то, что у разрабов маленькая база донатеров и проект затухает.
Я надеюсь что здесь они найдут только кукиш и проект закроеться.

Такого контента навалом на nutaku, тут этого не надо.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010134705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 226, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1472171045}
review:
Well...  We have 2 energy systems, a timer based misison system that encourages you to buy the premium in game currency.  BTW theres a game currency and a premium currency.  Basically all the standard stuff to pester you to make "in game purchases."  Sadly, the combat is boring, the dress up part is somewhat limited and you aren't allowed to go on a "shoot" until level 10.  Which, I admit, I do not have the patience for.  

Short version:  *Yawn*

Sorry guys.  I would really like to see more adult oriented games out there.  And this one is, at least, not another QIX ripoff.  But... it's boring.  If you want to bore me into micro-transactions, you have to get me hooked into the game first.

Get out Facebook, we dont need this here.

If your looking for porn, nothing to see here folks. Just a pay to play facebook game.

[list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]

[*]Terrible graphics
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198105985522', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1472097432}
review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

  
You did come back different.

  
- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

  
- Hear about Frankie?
- Yeah.

  
- You going to the funeral?
- No, I'm not going.

  
Everybody knows,
sting someone, you die.

  
Don't waste it on a squirrel.
Such a hothead.

  
I guess he could have
just gotten out of the way.

  
I love this incorporating
an amusement park into our day.

  
That's why we don't need vacations.

  
Boy, quite a bit of pomp...
under the circumstances.

  
- Well, Adam, today we are men.
- We are!

  
- Bee-men.
- Amen!

  
Hallelujah!

  
Students, faculty, distinguished bees,

  
please welcome Dean Buzzwell.

  
Welcome, New Hive Oity
graduating class of...

  
...9:15.

  
That concludes our ceremonies.

  
And begins your career
at Honex Industries!

  
Will we pick ourjob today?

  
I heard it's just orientation.

  
Heads up! Here we go.

  
Keep your hands and antennas
inside the tram at all times.

  
- Wonder what it'll be like?
- A little scary.

  
Welcome to Honex,
a division of Honesco

  
and a part of the Hexagon Group.

  
This is it!

  
Wow.

  
Wow.

  
We know that you, as a bee,
have worked your whole life

  
to get to the point where you
can work for your whole life.

  
Honey begins when our valiant Pollen
Jocks bring the nectar to the hive.

  
Our top-secret formula

  
is automatically color-corrected,
scent-adjusted and bubble-contoured

  
into this soothing sweet syrup

  
with its distinctive
golden glow you know as...

  
Honey!

  
- That girl was hot.
- She's my cousin!

  
- She is?
- Yes, we're all cousins.

  
- Right. You're right.
- At Honex, we constantly strive

  
to improve every aspect
of bee existence.

  
These bees are stress-testing
a new helmet technology.

  
- What do you think he makes?
- Not enough.

  
Here we have our latest advancement,
the Krelman.

  
- What does that do?
- Oatches that little strand of honey

  
that hangs after you pour it.
Saves us millions.

  
Oan anyone work on the Krelman?

  
Of course. Most bee jobs are
small ones. But bees know

  
that every small job,
if it's done well, means a lot.

  
But choose carefully

  
because you'll stay in the job
you pick for the rest of your life.

  
The same job the rest of your life?
I didn't know that.

  
What's the difference?

  
You'll be happy to know that bees,
as a species, haven't had one day off

  
in 27 million years.

  
So you'll just work us to death?

  
We'll sure try.

  
Wow! That blew my mind!

  
"What's the difference?"
How can you say that?

  
One job forever?
That's an insane choice to have to make.

  
I'm relieved. Now we only have
to make one decision in life.

  
But, Adam, how could they
never have told us that?

  
Why would you question anything?
We're bees.

  
We're the most perfectly
functioning society on Earth.

  
You ever think maybe things
work a little too well here?

  
Like what? Give me one example.

  
I don't know. But you know
what I'm talking about.

  
Please clear the gate.
Royal Nectar Force on approach.

  
Wait a second. Oheck it out.

  
- Hey, those are Pollen Jocks!
- Wow.

  
I've never seen them this close.

  
They know what it's like
outside the hive.

  
Yeah, but some don't come back.

  
- Hey, Jocks!
- Hi, Jocks!

  
You guys did great!

  
You're monsters!
You're sky freaks! I love it! I love it!

  
- I wonder where they were.
- I don't know.

  
Their day's not planned.

  
Outside the hive, flying who knows
where, doing who knows what.

  
You can'tjust decide to be a Pollen
Jock. You have to be bred for that.

  
Right.

  
Look. That's more pollen
than you and I will see in a lifetime.

  
It's just a status symbol.
Bees make too much of it.

  
Perhaps. Unless you're wearing it
and the ladies see you wearing it.

  
Those ladies?
Aren't they our cousins too?

  
Distant. Distant.

  
Look at these two.

  
- Oouple of Hive Harrys.
- Let's have fun with them.

  
It must be dangerous
being a Pollen Jock.

  
Yeah. Once a bear pinned me
against a mushroom!

  
He had a paw on my throat,
and with the other, he was slapping me!

  
- Oh, my!
- I never thought I'd knock him out.

  
What were you doing during this?

  
Trying to alert the authorities.

  
I can autograph that.

  
A little gusty out there today,
wasn't it, comrades?

  
Yeah. Gusty.

  
We're hitting a sunflower patch
six miles from here tomorrow.

  
- Six miles, huh?
- Barry!

  
A puddle jump for us,
but maybe you're not up for it.

  
- Maybe I am.
- You are not!

  
We're going 0900 at J-Gate.

  
What do you think, buzzy-boy?
Are you bee enough?

  
I might be. It all depends
on what 0900 means.

  
Hey, Honex!

  
Dad, you surprised me.

  
You decide what you're interested in?

  
- Well, there's a lot of choices.
- But you only get one.

  
Do you ever get bored
doing the same job every day?

  
Son, let me tell you about stirring.

  
You grab that stick, and you just
move it around, and you stir it around.

  
You get yourself into a rhythm.
It's a beautiful thing.

  
You know, Dad,
the more I think about it,

  
maybe the honey field
just isn't right for me.

  
You were thinking of what,
making balloon animals?

  
That's a bad job
for a guy with a stinger.

  
Janet, your son's not sure
he wants to go into honey!

  
- Barry, you are so funny sometimes.
- I'm not trying to be funny.

  
You're not funny! You're going
into honey. Our son, the stirrer!

  
- You're gonna be a stirrer?
- No one's listening to me!

  
Wait till you see the sticks I have.

  
I could say anything right now.
I'm gonna get an ant tattoo!

  
Let's open some honey and celebrate!

  
Maybe I'll pierce my thorax.
Shave my antennae.

  
Shack up with a grasshopper. Get
a gold tooth and call everybody "dawg"!

  
I'm so proud.

  
- We're starting work today!
- Today's the day.

  
Oome on! All the good jobs
will be gone.

  
Yeah, right.

  
Pollen counting, stunt bee, pouring,
stirrer, front desk, hair removal...

  
- Is it still available?
- Hang on. Two left!

  
One of them's yours! Oongratulations!
Step to the side.

  
- What'd you get?
- Picking crud out. Stellar!

  
Wow!

  
Oouple of newbies?

  
Yes, sir! Our first day! We are ready!

  
Make your choice.

  
- You want to go first?
- No, you go.

  
Oh, my. What's available?

  
Restroom attendant's open,
not for the reason you think.

  
- Any chance of getting the Krelman?
- Sure, you're on.

  
I'm sorry, the Krelman just closed out.

  
Wax monkey's always open.

  
The Krelman opened up again.

  
What happened?

  
A bee died. Makes an opening. See?
He's dead. Another dead one.

  
Deady. Deadified. Two more dead.

  
Dead from the neck up.
Dead from the neck down. That's life!

  
Oh, this is so hard!

author: {'steamid': '76561198033178258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1472189281}
review:
Клон Hero Zero от тех же разработчиков, но более неповоротливый, угловатый и приправленный пошлячинкой. В целом заметно уступает предшественнику, и не хило так уступает. Но если вы не знакомы с Hero Zero, то игрушка вполне может зайти. Так, побаловаться немножко, уделив этому продукту чуток времени. Но все же больше нет, чем да.

PS
Одно смущает и удивляет: в первый же день выхода игры, в ней уже находится не мало игроков, которые успели прокачаться до космических высот - 200, 300 и выше уровня. Как-то это не совсем серьезно и честно по отношению к другим.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097675823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 367, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1472365059}
review:
Big bang empire is a click and wait game, Big Bang Empire is not too far from your standard clicker but instead of button mashing your only option here is wait, the interface is all over the place with thousands of menu screens for different things, it can be pretty easy for rts players but for arcade gamers can be a kind challenging the learn curve for this game, I had high hopes for this game but the microtransactions, low fps and the click and wait genre doesn't got a good combination.

+beautiful ladies
-runs a little bit slow

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198289465566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1477346547}
review:
Tellville şehrimizde başladığımız en ünlü porno yıldızı olma yolunda oyunun eksi ve artıları şu şekilde:

+Oyunun amacı porno yıldızı olmak ilginç ve merak uyandırıcı bir konu.

+Oyunda Erkek veya Kız karakterimizi oluşturup başlıyoruz ki karakter oluşturma ekranı sade basit gayet güzel.

+Oyunda yetenek dağıtma başka oyuncularla vs atma gibi bir sistem var gayet güzel olmuş.

+Oyunun Pornografi odaklı olması biraz rasız edici gibi görünsede oyun içinde sapıklık derecesinde bir pornografi yok +15 için uygun bence.

+Bence eğlenceli değişik bir oyun denemek lazım.


-Vs sistemi geliştirilebilir şuanlık çok iyi değil.

-Oyun konusu itibarı ile belli bir kesime hitap edebilcek düzeyde.

-Facebookla aynı sunucuyu kullanıyor steame özel sunucu açılmalı oyun steamde bu gün açıldı 350 lvl adam var facebook sunucusundan eğer steame özel sunucu açılırsa oynamayı düşünüyorum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002104640', 'num_games_owned': 1915, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1472116733}
review:
Донат. А за что? 
У этой "игры" нет геймплея. Серьезно.

Попытка срубить бабла со школьника, который рассчитывает увидеть "что-то неприличное".
В интернете или в стиме полно других мест, где можно повидать сиськи, тем более что здесь акцент на них даже не сделан.

ЗЫ: Вы также можете попробовать нарисовать сиськи самостоятельно на бумаге или в графическом редакторе, и они все равно будут выглядеть лучше, чем в этом куске кала.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053711914', 'num_games_owned': 568, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1472040079}
review:
Okay Steam.. What. xD 
I mean, I would love to see more X rated games on Steam (like old classics ala Playboy: the Mansion, etc.), but this is a browsergame.. I've played it in the past, it's pretty repetitive.. But that's how browsergames are like.

And for some reason I can't log into my old account?
(Well nevermind, I just tried logging onto all my emails using their site and it keeps telling me that there were no players bound to the mails.. Maybe it got deleted for inactivity or it didn't have an account system back then.)
Still weird that they don't show a possibility of logging into your account when starting the program.. Are you forced to start from the beginning? All I wanted was to see how my old character was doing.. xD

Anyway, not a game I would start over again from 0..

author: {'steamid': '76561198073188547', 'num_games_owned': 630, 'num_reviews': 206, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1472038793}
review:
Capita davvero poche volte di vedere titoli del genere,
giocandoci ho scoperto che era peggio del previsto.

Non c'e' molto da dire su questo titolo, e' il classico gioco per 
smartphone importato su steam.

PRO:

Nessuno, letteralmente

CONTRO:

-Un gioco ridicolo
-"PayToWin"
-Graficamente pessimo
-Assenza di un gameplay, semplicemente mandi il PG a lavorare e aspetti qualche ora. 
-"combattimenti" 

Note personali:

Quando iniziai a giocarci, mi sentivo in un perenne disagio , gia' vedendo la personalizzazione
mi sono messo le mani nei capelli.
La parte che mi ha lasciato letteralmente senza parole.. i dannati combattimenti, quando si colpiscono
sembra che fanno altro.

Se ti piace perdere tempo, accomodati.

Voto: 0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198078519628', 'num_games_owned': 1567, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 21264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1358, 'last_played': 1598046155}
review:
This game is pretty much like Shakes & Fidget, with the minimal ammount of interaction from your part, other than waiting for missions to be done or paying premium currency for them to be over instantly. Except that unlike in S&F, the humour and the comic like artstyle is replaced by pure lame sex appeal. I wouldn't recommend this at all, unless you like waiting and paying. Hell, even one of the tips urges you to buy diamonds to get an advantage over the other players. I shit you not, even took a screenshot.

Also, the game tells you to rate the app after a few quests.....

author: {'steamid': '76561198070863399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1472028104}
review:
This is a reskinned HeroZero, which itself is kind of fun. Yet it's pretty much exactly the same, with the few changes that make this game not as enjoyable as HeroZero. It's free, yet I would still say to just play heroZero if you want to play a game like this. Same devs and everything, just with a superhero theme, a very funny one.  Though do not play any of these games on steam..many feature are not available on the steam version..yet you play with player who are playing on other platforms..they will have an advantage. Like in HeroZero on Steam, time timers are longer, and you don't have the methods to shorten those timers.

This is a facebook game, best played on facebook as you'll have all the features. Here you'll play for months and see people 2 days old fly right by you. 5 minute timer for bosses on steam, 3 min timer on facebook..plus you get Batteries and videos to lower your time. Do not play these games on steam.  

I would give HeroZero a 6/10 and Big Bang a 2/10.

I am not recommending it on steam. On steam both games get 0/10
